title: Massive Black Hole formation in proto-stellar clusters via early gas accretion
comment: Talk delivered at the XIV Conference on New Frontiers in Physics, Crete, Greece 2025
summary: We review our semi-analytic model of stellar black hole (BH) mass growth by gas accretion in gas-rich stellar clusters during their birthstage within the first $\sim 10\,{\rm Myr}$ after the first stellar formation event. Such proto-stellar clusters are massive and compact, with typical masses $\sim 10^6\,{\rm M}_\odot$ and sizes $\sim 1\,{\rm pc}$, suggested by recent James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) observations. We find that the BH masses are shifted by the end of gas depletion to values within and above the BH mass gap, well within the range of components of the recent gravitational-wave (GW) signal GW231123, and up to masses $\sim 10^3\,{\rm M}_\odot$.

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了恒星黑洞在气体富集星团诞生初期通过气体吸积增长质量的半解析模型，发现黑洞质量可在气体耗尽前跨越质量间隙，达到约1000倍太阳质量，与引力波事件GW231123观测结果一致。
AI.motivation: 解释近期引力波探测（如GW231123）中观测到的处于或超出“黑洞质量间隙”的中等质量黑洞起源问题，并结合JWST对致密大质量原星团的新观测证据。
AI.method: 构建半解析模型，模拟气体富集、致密（~1 pc）、大质量（~10⁶ M⊙）原星团在诞生后约10 Myr内，恒星黑洞通过气体吸积的质量增长过程。
AI.result: 黑洞质量在气体耗尽结束时可跨越并显著超出质量间隙，达~10³ M⊙，其质量分布与GW231123中双黑洞组件质量范围一致。
AI.conclusion: 原星团早期高效气体吸积是形成中等质量黑洞、填补并超越质量间隙的一条可行途径，为LIGO/Virgo/KAGRA探测到的特殊引力波源提供了重要理论支持。

title: Thermal field theory and the QCD Equation of State
comment: 11 pages, 6 figures, chapter for Encyclopedia of Particle Physics
summary: This Chapter introduces QCD at finite temperature and density. We first present the formulation of the thermal theory in the Euclidean path integral formalism. We then describe how the strong dynamics at high temperature can be inspected through thermal effective field theories. As a concrete example of thermodynamic quantity, we discuss the Equation of State, which characterises the equilibrium properties of the QCD plasma. We finally conclude with an overview of the phase diagram of strongly interacting matter.

AI.tldr: 本章介绍了有限温度和密度下的量子色动力学（QCD），涵盖热场论的欧几里得路径积分形式、高温下强相互作用的动力学分析方法（如热有效场论）、物态方程（EOS）及其在QCD等离子体平衡性质中的应用，并综述了强相互作用物质的相图。
AI.motivation: 理解强相互作用物质在高温高密条件下的性质，特别是QCD相变与等离子体行为，对高能核物理和宇宙早期演化研究至关重要。
AI.method: 采用欧几里得路径积分形式构建有限温QCD热场论框架；利用热有效场论分析高温极限下的强动力学；以物态方程为典型热力学量进行具体讨论；综合已有理论与格点计算结果描绘相图。
AI.result: 系统梳理了有限温密QCD的基本理论框架、关键热力学量（如物态方程）的计算思路，以及强相互作用物质相结构的主要特征（如夸克胶子等离子体相与强子相的过渡）。
AI.conclusion: 有限温密QCD可通过热场论与有效理论方法系统研究，物态方程是刻画QCD等离子体平衡性质的核心，其相图展现出丰富而复杂的临界行为与相结构。

title: Coarse Graining Holographic Black Holes in Higher Curvature Gravity
summary: We consider the holographic description of the dynamical black hole entropy in $f(R)$ higher curvature gravity proposed by Hollands-Wald-Zhang. On the bulk side, we show that the coarse-grained entropy (outer entropy) of a generalized marginally trapped surface corresponds precisely to the Wald entropy associated with this surface. To get this result, we first formulate the AdS/CFT correspondence in the Einstein frame and derive the correspondence between von Neumann entropy of the Einstein frame and the $f(R)$ frame. This facilitates the derivation of the correspondence between the two outer entropies in the two frames. Furthermore, we directly derive a focusing theorem associated with generalized expansion in $f(R)$ gravity. We then formulate how to construct the stationary null hypersurface for the generalized expansion and the junction condition to glue a hypersurface in $f(R)$ gravity. Combining these results, we derive the expression for the entropy in the $f(R)$ frame and identify its holographic dual.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了f(R)高曲率引力中动态黑洞熵的全息描述，证明了广义边缘陷获面的粗粒度熵（外熵）精确对应于该表面的Wald熵，并建立了f(R)框架下熵的全息对偶。
AI.motivation: 建立f(R)高曲率引力中动态黑洞熵的全息描述，弥合广义相对论与高阶引力理论在全息熵定义上的差距。
AI.method: 在Einstein框架下构建AdS/CFT对应，推导Einstein框架与f(R)框架下冯·诺依曼熵及外熵的对应关系；推导f(R)引力中广义膨胀相关的聚焦定理；构造广义膨胀下的稳态零超曲面并给出f(R)引力中的拼接条件。
AI.result: 证明了f(R)引力中广义边缘陷获面的外熵等于其Wald熵，并给出了该熵在边界CFT中的全息对偶表达式。
AI.conclusion: f(R)高曲率引力中动态黑洞的粗粒度熵具有清晰的全息解释，其全息对偶由边界CFT的von Neumann熵给出，从而推广了Ryu-Takayanagi公式到更高阶引力理论。

title: Photometry of Fireballs using High Frame Rate Cameras
summary: Fast sampling photometry is essential for characterising fireballs and their fragmentation episodes which link to the meteoroid internal structure. Accurate measurements remain challenging due to the large required dynamic range of up to 10 stellar magnitudes driving up operational complexity and cost. We developed an all-sky camera system operating at up to 500 frames per second featuring a novel Detection Localised Auto-brightness Control. Custom software manages high data throughput via transient detection and region-of-interest saving with real-time photometry. Two field deployments validate photometric accuracy against conventional 30 frames per second cameras and demonstrate the successful capture of a bright magnitude -15 fireball with minimal saturation. The system achieves an effective dynamic range between apparent magnitudes -3 and -17 capturing minimally saturated light curves for most fireballs. A successful semi-empirical fragmentation analysis verifies its ability to provide data for detailed physical modelling. The primary application for this validated system will be as a core component of the Global Fireball Observatory's next-generation instrumentation. The intention is to deploy it in a hybrid observatory, operating alongside a dedicated high-resolution astrometric camera. This configuration will allow the network to simultaneously capture precise trajectory data for orbit and fall-line calculations and acquire complete, unsaturated high dynamic range light curves at high temporal resolution for detailed physical analysis, combining the strengths of both systems.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一种新型高速全天空摄像系统，采用局部自适应亮度控制技术，实现高达500帧/秒的采样率和-3至-17星等的有效动态范围，成功获取未饱和火球光变曲线并支持碎片化物理建模。
AI.motivation: 传统火球观测受限于大动态范围（达10星等）需求，导致系统复杂昂贵；需提升采样速率与光度精度以揭示流星体内部结构及碎片化过程。
AI.method: 开发了基于检测局部自动亮度控制（DLAC）的高速全天空相机系统，配合实时暂现源检测、感兴趣区域存储与实时测光软件，并通过两次实地部署验证性能。
AI.result: 系统在-3至-17星等间实现有效动态范围，成功捕获亮度达-15等的火球且极少饱和；实测光度精度优于常规30帧/秒相机；完成半经验碎片化分析，验证其支持物理建模能力。
AI.conclusion: 该系统已被确认为全球火球观测网下一代核心设备，将与高分辨率测角相机组成混合观测站，同步获取高精度轨道参数与高时序、高动态范围光变曲线。

title: Gravitational Baryogenesis in $f(R)$ Cosmologies
summary: The generation of a baryon-antibaryon asymmetry in the Universe via gravitational baryogenesis is investigated for two f(R) modified theories of gravity, the widely used Starobinsky $f(R)=R+R^{2}/M^{2}$ model, and the recently proposed power-law model $f(R)=c_{1}R^{2+k/4}+c_{2}R+c_{3}$ of Odintsov and Oikonomou (2025) that is constructed from the slow-roll inflation parameters, and fits the new high-multipole CMB observations reported by the Planck and ACT collaborations for $k \sim -0.03$. The present investigation is undertaken in the Einstein frame. The motion of the scalaron is studied for the slow roll inflationary era using analytic approximate solutions obtained from its potential and, from these solutions, analytic expressions for the Ricci scalar, its time derivative, the Hubble parameter and the scale factor of the Universe. These expressions for the Starobinsky model were obtained first by Motohashi and Nishizawa (2012) but the expressions for the power-law model of Odintsov and Oikonomou and its generalization are new. The calculated values of the baryon asymmetry factor $η$ for the Starobinsky model vary from $(1.05 - 1.46) \times 10^{-11}$, and for the power-law model, from $(1.06 - 1.53) \times 10^{-11}$. The power-law values depend upon the unknown fitting parameters $c_{1}$ and $c_{2}$, and a future fit of the Odintsov and Oikonomou model to data could yield enhanced values. The values for $η$ depend upon a mass parameter $M_{\ast}$ which is expected to be of the order of $M_{Pl}=2.435 \times 10^{18}$ GeV. The values of $η$ for both models have been calculated for $M_{\ast}=M_{Pl}$ and are quite close to the observed value $η= 8.65 \times 10^{-11}$. Since $η\propto (M/M_{\ast})^{2}$, reducing $M_{\ast}$ slightly from $M_{Pl}$ to $0.4 M_{Pl}$ would bring the calculated values into agreement with the observed value.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了两种f(R)引力修正理论（Starobinsky模型和Odintsov-Oikonomou幂律模型）在爱因斯坦框架下通过引力重子生成机制产生宇宙重子-反重子不对称性的能力，给出了慢滚暴胀时期标量场动力学的解析近似解，并计算出重子不对称因子η，其值接近观测值，可通过调节质量参数M*与普朗克质量的关系实现精确匹配。
AI.motivation: 解释宇宙中观测到的重子-反重子不对称性（即物质-反物质不对称）是宇宙学基本问题之一；引力重子生成机制提供了一种不依赖于标准粒子物理B-violating过程的新途径；而f(R)引力修正理论（尤其是能拟合最新CMB数据的模型）为该机制提供了新的引力背景。
AI.method: 在爱因斯坦帧下，对Starobinsky模型f(R)=R+R²/M²和Odintsov-Oikonomou幂律模型f(R)=c₁R^(2+k/4)+c₂R+c₃，求解标量场（scalaron）在慢滚暴胀时期的运动方程，利用其有效势得到Ricci标量、其时间导数、Hubble参数及尺度因子的解析近似表达式；进而代入引力重子生成公式计算重子不对称因子η，并分析其对参数（如M*、c₁、c₂）的依赖性。
AI.result: Starobinsky模型给出η ∈ (1.05–1.46)×10⁻¹¹，幂律模型给出η ∈ (1.06–1.53)×10⁻¹¹；二者均在取M*=M_Pl时接近但略小于观测值η=8.65×10⁻¹¹；由于η ∝ (M/M*)²，将M*从M_Pl降至约0.4M_Pl即可使理论值与观测一致；幂律模型的结果依赖于尚未精确确定的c₁、c₂参数，未来数据拟合可能提升预测精度。
AI.conclusion: 两种f(R)引力模型均可在引力重子生成框架下自然产生与观测同量级的重子不对称性，验证了该机制在修正引力理论中的可行性；结果对质量尺度M*高度敏感，暗示重子不对称性可能与量子引力能标密切相关；Odintsov-Oikonomou幂律模型作为新提出的、符合高精度CMB数据的模型，展现出与Starobinsky模型相当甚至更优的重子生成潜力。

title: New Black hole Solutions in $f(\mathbb{Q})$ Gravity
summary: We investigate static and spherically symmetric vacuum solutions in the symmetric teleparallel $f(\mathbb{Q})$ modified theory of gravity. Starting from a recently proposed classification of affine connections compatible with both the symmetries of spacetime and the constraints of symmetric teleparallel geometry, we develop a systematic approach to solve the full field equations. We first identify two distinct classes of connections that satisfy the off-diagonal metric field equations and the connection constraints. For an arbitrary $f(\mathbb{Q})$ function when the non-metricity scalar $\mathbb{Q}$ vanishes, we recover exact analytical solutions equivalent to those of general relativity, including the Schwarzschild and Schwarzschild (anti)de-Sitter metrics. We then extend our analysis beyond general relativity by considering the quadratic model $f(\mathbb{Q})=\mathbb{Q}+α~\mathbb{Q}^2$ with a small parameter $α$. Using a perturbative approach, we derive asymptotically flat, analytical solutions up to second order in $α$. These solutions exhibit corrections to the standard Schwarzschild metric, characterized by new integration constants that can be interpreted as connection hair. We explore the asymptotic behavior of these solutions and disclose that the horizon radius receives corrections that can be expressed compactly using the Lambert $\mathcal{W}$ function. Our results provide new, non-trivial vacuum solutions within $f(\mathbb{Q})$ gravity and highlight the rich structure introduced by the non-metricity connection.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了对称度规平行f(Q)引力理论中的静态球对称真空解，通过分类兼容时空对称性和对称度规平行几何约束的仿射联络，系统求解场方程；在Q=0时恢复广义相对论解（如Schwarzschild度规），并在f(Q)=Q+αQ²模型下用微扰法得到含‘联络毛发’的新解析解，其视界半径修正可用Lambert W函数简洁表达。
AI.motivation: 探索对称度规平行f(Q)引力中非平凡真空解，揭示非度规性联络带来的新物理结构（如‘连接毛发’）及其对黑洞解的影响。
AI.method: 基于对称性和几何约束对仿射联络进行分类，结合精确求解与微扰方法（针对f(Q)=Q+αQ²模型，展开至α²阶），求解完整场方程。
AI.result: 1）Q=0时精确复现GR的Schwarzschild及(反)de-Sitter解；2）在二次模型下获得渐近平直、含新积分常数（解释为‘连接毛发’）的解析解；3）视界半径修正可由Lambert W函数紧凑表达。
AI.conclusion: f(Q)引力存在区别于GR的丰富真空解结构，非度规性联络引入可观测的几何自由度（连接毛发），为检验该理论提供了新途径。

title: Application of Selenium-82 for Short Base Neutrino Oscillations Searches
summary: Characteristics of neutrino absorption by $^{82}$Se nucleus reaction -- low threshold value, high absorption cross section of neutrinos, emitted by artificial sources, make selenium-82 perspective object to search for new neutrino species in calibration experiments. One of the interesting possibilities is usage of scintillating crystals. In (3+1) model for spherical geometry the expression for neutrino path length in a setup in the presence of oscillations is obtained and the scheme of experiment is proposed.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了利用硒-82核反应探测人工中微子源产生的中微子，以寻找新型中微子（如第4种中微子）的可能性，并在(3+1)模型下推导了球形几何中考虑振荡效应的中微子路径长度表达式，提出相应实验方案。
AI.motivation: 硒-82具有低阈值和对人工中微子源高吸收截面的特性，适合作为校准实验中搜寻新中微子种类的候选材料。
AI.method: 基于(3+1)中微子模型，在球形几何构型下推导含振荡效应的中微子路径长度解析表达式，并提出使用闪烁晶体的实验方案。
AI.result: 获得了考虑中微子振荡时在球形装置中的路径长度表达式，并设计了一套适用于硒-82的中微子校准实验方案。
AI.conclusion: 硒-82是开展人工中微子源校准实验、探索轻惰性中微子等新物理的理想候选核素，闪烁晶体探测器可有效支持该类实验。

title: Characterization of Residual Morphological Substructure Using Supervised and Unsupervised Deep Learning
comment: This manuscript is a preprint that has not undergone peer review and is being shared to ensure dissemination and community access to the results and insights (see acknowledgements)
summary: Automated characterization of galactic substructure is an essential step in understanding the transformative physical processes driving galaxy evolution. In this study, we investigate the application of deep learning (DL) frameworks to characterize different galactic substructures hosted within parametric light-profile subtracted ``residual'' images of a large sample galaxies from the CANDELS survey. We develop a supervised Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) and unsupervised Convolutional Variational Autoencoder (CvAE) and train it on the single-Sérsic profile fitting based residual images of $10,046$ bright and massive galaxies ($H<24.5\,{\rm mag}$ and $M_{\rm stellar} \geq 10^{9.5}\,M_{\odot}$) spanning $1<z<3$, in conjunction with their visual-based classification labels indicating the nature of residual substructures hosted within them. Using our unique data preprocessing approach, we prepare our residual images such that the inputs to our DL networks comprise only ``galaxy of interest'', and augment them such that our sample span uniformly across different residual characteristics. We assess the latent space of the CNN and CvAE using Principle Component Analysis (PCA) along with independently quantified metrics of residual strength (significant pixel flux $SPF$, Bumpiness, and Residual Flux Fraction). We also employ an unsupervised Gaussian Mixture Modeling (GMM) based clustering scheme with Support Vector Classification (SVC) to identify groupings in PCA space that correspond to similar residual substructure. We find that our supervised CNN latent features in PCA space correlate with the $SPF$ values and distinguish between qualitatively strong and weak residual substructures. While our unsupervised CvAE latent space also correlates with visual and quantitative residual characteristics, but lacks clear discriminatory power when characterizing different residual substructures.

AI.tldr: 本文利用深度学习方法（CNN和CvAE）对CANDELS巡天中10046个高红移星系的残差图像进行自动子结构表征，结合视觉分类标签与定量指标（如SPF、Bumpiness等），发现监督CNN在区分强/弱残差结构方面表现良好，而无监督CvAE虽相关但判别力较弱。
AI.motivation: 自动化表征星系子结构是理解星系演化物理过程的关键步骤，传统方法依赖人工，效率低且主观性强，亟需数据驱动的客观方法。
AI.method: 构建监督式CNN与无监督式卷积变分自编码器（CvAE），在基于单Sérsic拟合的残差图像上训练；采用独特预处理与数据增强确保输入仅含目标星系并覆盖各类残差特征；使用PCA分析潜空间，并结合SPF、Bumpiness、残差流量分数等定量指标及GMM+SVC聚类评估模型性能。
AI.result: 监督CNN潜特征在PCA空间中与SPF高度相关，能有效区分强/弱残差子结构；无监督CvAE潜空间虽与视觉及定量残差特征相关，但缺乏对不同类型子结构的清晰判别能力。
AI.conclusion: 监督式深度学习框架（如CNN）在星系残差子结构自动表征任务中更具实用价值，而纯无监督方法（如CvAE）需进一步改进以提升结构分辨能力。

title: Unquenched Charmonium and Beyond
summary: The year 2024 marked the 50th anniversary of the discovery of the $J/ψ$ particle, which unveiled the charm quark and the charmonium spectrum, instigating the "November Revolution" in particle physics. This discovery catalyzed the development of quenched potential models, most notably the Cornell model, which provided a foundational quantitative description of the hadronic spectrum. However, the landscape of hadron spectroscopy has been profoundly transformed since the turn of the 21st century with the observation of numerous charmonium-like states, such as $X(3872)$, which exhibit properties starkly at odds with quenched model predictions. These discrepancies, exemplified by the "$X(3872)$ low-mass puzzle" and the "$Y$ problem" associated with vector states like $Y(4260)$, underscore the critical limitations of the quenched approximation and signal the necessity for a new theoretical paradigm. This review synthesizes recent advances in hadronic spectroscopy, arguing that the unquenched picture, which incorporates coupled-channel effects such as hadronic loops, is essential for a unified description of these new states and associated anomalies. We demonstrate how unquenched effects provide compelling solutions to long-standing puzzles in charmonium decays (e.g., the "$ρπ$ puzzle" and anomalous dipion transitions), predict and explain the existence of exotic charged states like $Z_c(3900)$ and $Z_b(10610)$ via mechanisms such as Initial Single Pion Emission, and offer a framework for understanding interactions between charmonia and with nucleons. Furthermore, we emphasize the universality of unquenched effects, extending their application to bottomonium and light-flavor sectors. With improving precision, we advocate systematic development of unquenched hadronic spectroscopy.

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了2024年J/ψ粒子发现50周年以来强子谱学的发展，指出传统‘淬火’势模型（如Cornell模型）已无法解释X(3872)等新发现的类粲偶素态，强调引入‘非淬火’图像（含强子圈等耦合通道效应）是解决长期难题（如ρπ谜题、X(3872)低质量之谜）并统一描述奇特强子态的关键，并主张将其系统拓展至底偶素和轻味强子领域。

title: dS$^4$ Metamorphosis
summary: We study the Euclidean path integral of higher spin gravity on $S^4$. Based on a one-loop analysis, we are led to a gluing formula expressing the $S^4$ path integral in terms of an underlying $S^3$ path integral. We view the three-sphere as a boundary hypersurface splitting the four-sphere into two halves. For a higher spin spectrum containing even spins only, the resulting boundary theory living on the $S^3$ cut is the $\mathrm{Sp}(N)$ invariant sector of $N\in \mathbb{Z}^+$ anti-commuting, conformally coupled free scalars, with conformal higher spin sources mediating the gluing. This boundary $\mathrm{Sp}(N)$ theory was previously shown to compute the Hartle-Hawking wavefunction at $\mathcal{I}^+$ in the higher spin dS$_4$/CFT$_3$ correspondence. In contrast to the infinite spatial volume of $\mathcal{I}^+$, here the conformal fields populate a finite size $S^3$ hypersurface of $S^4$. For theories with both bosonic and fermionic higher spin fields, the gluing formula is instead built from an $\mathcal{N}=2$ superconformal boundary field theory coupled to $U(N)$ invariant superconformal sources. Under this assumption, the leading contribution to the four-sphere partition function is $2^N$, and we observe exact cancellations at one-loop.

AI.motivation: 理解高自旋引力在紧致时空（如S^4）上的全量子行为，并建立其与边界共形场论的精确联系，尤其是拓展dS4/CFT3对应到有限尺寸边界情形。
AI.method: 基于欧几里得路径积分框架，进行一阶量子涨落（单圈）分析，推导S^4被S^3切分后的拼接公式；分别处理纯偶数自旋与玻色-费米混合高自旋谱情形，构造相应的Sp(N)和U(N)不变边界共形/超共形理论。
AI.result: 得到S^4路径积分的S^3拼接表达式；识别出边界理论分别为Sp(N)不变自由标量理论（偶自旋）和N=2超共形U(N)理论（全谱）；计算得S^4配分函数主项为2^N，并发现单圈贡献精确抵消。
AI.conclusion: 高自旋引力在S^4上的量子路径积分可由有限尺寸S^3上的特定对称性约束共形/超共形边界理论完全刻画，揭示了紧致欧氏背景中高自旋AdS/dS-CFT对应的新实现形式，且量子修正具强约束性（如单圈相消）。

title: Direct comparison of SiPMs and PMTs in operation with a bright background and prospects of using SPADs as truly digital sensors
comment: 4 pages, 3 figures, Proceedings of the 12th International Workshop on Ring Imaging Cherenkov Detectors (RICH2025), Accepted for publication in Nuclear Instruments and Methods in Physics Research - section A (NIM-A)
summary: The use of silicon photomultipliers (SiPMs) alongside conventional photomultiplier tubes (PMTs) is a remarkable technological development in modern ground-based very high energy gamma-ray astronomy. SiPMs exhibit comparable or even higher photon detection efficiencies (PDEs) than PMTs. The sensitivity of a PMT matches well the spectral shape of Cherenkov radiation from extended air showers. In contrast to a PMT, the sensitivity of a SiPM is shifted toward longer wavelengths, where the intensity of light of night sky (LoNS), considered as unwanted noise, increases significantly. It is obvious that a SiPM with a higher PDE will indeed measure more Cherenkov light than a PMT, but it will also detect significantly higher LoNS noise; the question is which factor will predominate in the signal-to-noise-ratio (SNR). To compare the performance of a PMT with that of a SiPM, we built SiPM-based modules and installed these and operated in parallel in the imaging camera of the 17 m diameter MAGIC telescope. Our long-term studies show that SiPM, despite their higher PDE, can deliver only a comparable to PMT performance. As already the name SiPM suggests, we use these semiconductor sensors analogously to classical PMTs: We amplify their small signals, digitize, and calibrate the converted amplitudes. Although SiPM is essentially a digital sensor, its common-anode design does not allow one to directly profit from it. Numerous arrays of single-photon avalanche diodes (SPADs) are being developed in various laboratories worldwide. Unlike SiPM, SPAD arrays digitize the incident photons from the outset and count their number. We will dwell on the potential further developments of SPADs.

AI.tldr: 本文比较了硅光电倍增管（SiPM）与传统光电倍增管（PMT）在甚高能伽马射线天文观测中的性能，发现尽管SiPM具有更高的光子探测效率（PDE），但由于其对夜天光（LoNS）噪声更敏感，最终信噪比（SNR）与PMT相当；同时探讨了单光子雪崩二极管（SPAD）阵列作为未来数字化光探测器的潜力。
AI.motivation: 评估SiPM在地面伽马射线望远镜（如MAGIC）中替代PMT的可行性，核心在于厘清更高PDE带来的信号增益是否被其红移响应导致的夜天光噪声增加所抵消。
AI.method: 在MAGIC望远镜成像相机中并行安装和长期运行SiPM模块与PMT模块，进行实测对比；同时分析SiPM物理特性（如共阴极结构限制）及其与SPAD阵列在数字化探测机制上的根本差异。
AI.result: 实测表明，SiPM虽PDE更高，但因对长波段夜天光噪声更敏感，整体探测性能（如SNR、触发效率等）仅与PMT相当；SiPM当前模拟使用方式未能发挥其固有数字特性；而新型SPAD阵列可实现光子级直接数字化计数。
AI.conclusion: SiPM尚不能显著超越PMT在现有切伦科夫望远镜中的性能；未来突破需转向真正利用光子计数能力的器件（如SPAD阵列），推动探测器向全数字化演进。

title: Exponential Quintessence Model: Analytical Quantification of the Fine-Tuning Problem in Dark Energy
summary: In this paper, we investigate a quintessence field with an exponential potential motivated by the suggestion of time-varying dark energy from the DESI galaxy survey. Assuming a kination epoch in the early Universe, we analytically derive constraints on initial conditions that are consistent with Big Bang Nucleosynthesis and the current dark energy density. Compared to the severe 120-digit fine-tuning required for dark energy to be a cosmological constant, our result suggests that the degree of fine-tuning is naturally relaxed by dozens of orders of magnitude. Furthermore, we discuss the method for testing this model through future observations of the gravitational wave background.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了受DESI星系巡天观测启发的、具有指数势的精质场模型，通过假设早期宇宙存在动能主导时期，解析推导出与大爆炸核合成及当前暗能量密度一致的初始条件约束，显著缓解了宇宙学常数所需的120位精细调节问题，并探讨了利用未来引力波背景观测检验该模型的方法。
AI.motivation: 受DESI星系巡天暗示暗能量可能随时间变化的启发，研究指数势精质场模型以探索非恒定暗能量机制。
AI.method: 假设早期宇宙存在kination（动能主导）时期，解析推导满足大爆炸核合成（BBN）和当前暗能量密度观测约束的精质场初始条件。
AI.result: 相比宇宙学常数所需的120位精细调节，该模型将精细调节程度自然缓解了数十个数量级。
AI.conclusion: 指数势精质场结合kination早期历史可显著缓解暗能量精细调节问题，并可通过未来引力波背景观测进行检验。

title: Generalized Carter & Rüdiger Constants of $\sqrt{\text{Kerr}}$
summary: We consider the motion of a charged spinning test/probe particle -- governed by the Mathisson-Papapetrou-Dixon equations with generic, adiabatic, and conservative spin- and field-induced multipole moments -- in a background $\sqrt{\text{Kerr}}$ field on flat spacetime: the electromagnetic field of a charged spinning ring-disk singularity obtained from the $G\to 0$ limit of the Kerr-Newman solution for a charged spinning black hole. We investigate the existence of two extra hidden constants of motion, analogous to the Carter constant (for geodesic motion in a Kerr spacetime, or for its spinning-probe generalization) and Rüdiger's linear-in-spin constant for a spinning probe in a Kerr background. We find that these two constants exist only when the Wilson coefficients parameterizing the probe's multipole structure take the particular values corresponding to spin-exponentiation of the effective Compton amplitudes through second order in spin.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在平坦时空中的√Kerr电磁场中，带电自旋测试粒子的运动，发现当粒子多极结构的Wilson系数取特定值时，存在两个额外的隐藏运动常数，类似于Kerr时空中的Carter常数和Rüdiger线性自旋常数。
AI.motivation: 探索在√Kerr背景场中带电自旋粒子运动是否存在类似Kerr时空中的隐藏对称性与守恒量，以深化对自旋粒子动力学及有效场论中自旋效应的理解。
AI.method: 基于Mathisson-Papapetrou-Dixon方程，考虑含一般、绝热、保守自旋与场致多极矩的带电自旋测试粒子，在G→0极限下得到的√Kerr（即Kerr-Newman解的平直时空电磁场）背景中分析其运动积分。
AI.result: 发现仅当粒子多极结构的Wilson系数取对应于Compton振幅自旋指数化展开至二阶的特定值时，才存在两个类Carter与类Rüdiger的额外守恒量。
AI.conclusion: 该结果揭示了自旋粒子在强场背景中的运动守恒结构与量子有效振幅之间存在深刻联系，为自旋粒子的有效描述提供了对称性判据。

title: Two nearby states in the $X(3872)$ region: Resolving the radiative-decay ratio tension with $η_{c2}$
summary: Recently, LHCb reported the radiative-decay ratio ${\cal R}^{ψγ}\equiv {\cal B}[X(3872)\to ψ'γ]/{\cal B}[X(3872)\to J/ψγ]=1.67\pm 0.25$ extracted from $B^+\to K^+(J/ψγ, ψ'γ)$. This result differs markedly ($\sim4.6σ$) from the BESIII value obtained from $e^+e^-\to γ(J/ψγ, ψ'γ)$, ${\cal R}^{ψγ}=-0.04\pm 0.28$. Such a significant tension suggests that more than one state in the $X(3872)$ region contributes to the processes. We therefore propose a two-state scenario: a shallow $D^{*0}\bar{D}^0$ bound state with $J^{PC}=1^{++}$ and a $2^{-+}$ charmonium candidate, $η_{c2}$, slightly above the $D^{*0}\bar{D}^0$ threshold. We show that this hypothesis consistently describes these ratios along with other branching fractions and lineshapes across multiple processes. By contrast, fits without the $η_{c2}$ component fail to reproduce the radiative-ratio data. We also predict helicity-angle distributions that motivates the future experiments to test the two-state hypothesis and search for the so-far missing $η_{c2}$.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一个双态模型来解释X(3872)在不同实验中测得的辐射衰变比R^{ψγ}之间的显著张力，即LHCb与BESIII结果不一致的问题；该模型包含一个浅束缚态D*0 D¯0（1++）和一个略高于阈值的2−+粲偶素候选者ηc2，并成功拟合了多个衰变过程的数据，同时预测了可用于未来实验检验的螺旋度角分布。
AI.motivation: LHCb与BESIII对X(3872)→ψ'γ与X(3872)→J/ψγ分支比的测量结果存在约4.6σ的显著矛盾，暗示X(3872)区域可能存在多个叠加态，而非单一粒子。
AI.method: 构建包含一个1^{++}的浅D^{*0}\bar{D}^0束缚态和一个2^{-+}的η_{c2}态（略高于D^{*0}\bar{D}^0阈值）的双态干涉模型，通过拟合辐射衰变比、其他分支比及不变质量线形等多源实验数据进行验证，并预测螺旋度角分布以供检验。
AI.result: 双态模型能一致描述LHCb与BESIII的R^{ψγ}差异及其他相关衰变数据（如B→KX→Kψγ等），而单态拟合则明显失败；模型还预言了可区分的螺旋度角分布特征。
AI.conclusion: X(3872)区域很可能存在至少两个量子态叠加，其中2^{-+}的η_{c2}是关键新成分；该两态解释为解决长期存在的实验矛盾提供了自洽框架，并为未来寻找η_{c2}及检验其性质指明方向。

title: The Optical Properties of Host Galaxies of Radio Sources in the Coma Cluster
comment: 22 pages, 14 figures, 1 table. Accepted for publication in Galaxies
summary: We present a comprehensive study of host galaxies of radio sources within the 1.35$R_{200}$ of the Coma cluster by combining deep 144MHz observations from the LOFAR Two-Metre Sky Survey (LoTSS-DR2) with optical spectroscopy and photometry from DESI and SDSS. We identify 79 spectroscopically confirmed cluster members with reliable radio emission and classify them into compact, extended, and tailed subsamples according to their radio morphologies. By combining their radio and optical properties, we find compact radio sources are predominantly associated with massive, quiescent galaxies driven by AGN activity, while tailed sources are largely hosted by star-forming galaxies, tracing ongoing ram pressure stripping (RPS). Using phase-space analysis and a projected infall time proxy ($d_R$), we find that extended sources are preferentially located in the cluster outskirts ($d_R > 1$), while tailed sources are concentrated in the intermediate infall region ($0.4 < d_R < 1.0$), highlighting the influence of the dense intracluster medium.

AI.tldr: 本研究结合LOFAR低频射电与DESI/SDSS光学数据，系统分析了后发星系团内射电源宿主星系的性质，发现紧凑型射电源多位于大质量宁静星系中（由AGN驱动），而尾状射电源则多见于正在经历冲压剥离的恒星形成星系，并通过相空间分析揭示了不同射电形态在星系团中的空间分布规律。
AI.motivation: 理解星系团环境中射电源的起源及其与宿主星系演化的关系，特别是射电形态如何反映不同的物理过程（如AGN活动或冲压剥离）。
AI.method: 整合LOFAR LoTSS-DR2 144 MHz射电数据与DESI/SDSS光学光谱和测光数据，识别79个光谱证认的星系团成员射电源，并按射电形态分为紧凑型、延展型和尾状型；结合光学性质与相空间分析（使用投影入降时间代理参数d_R）进行分类统计。
AI.result: 紧凑型射电源主要寄主于大质量、宁静星系，由AGN驱动；尾状射电源主要寄主于恒星形成星系，是冲压剥离的示踪体；延展型源集中在星系团外围（d_R > 1），尾状源集中在中间入降区（0.4 < d_R < 1.0）。
AI.conclusion: 射电形态是星系团内星系演化阶段与环境作用（如AGN反馈或冲压剥离）的关键诊断工具，其空间分布受星系团致密介质显著影响。

title: Effective Hamiltonians and Wilson--Polchinski renormalisation
summary:
We develop a novel approach to the Wilsonian renormalisation of Hamiltonians for 2-dimensional quantum field theories on the cylinder described in the UV by marginally relevant deformations of conformal field theories. To introduce a Wilsonian short-distance cutoff we make essential use of free field realisations of the full vertex operator algebra in the UV. Our method is intrinsically non-perturbative; we derive a Hamiltonian analogue of Polchinski's equation describing the flows of all couplings.
  As a primary example of our general method, we apply it to the marginal anisotropic deformation of the $\mathfrak{su}_2$ Wess--Zumino--Witten model at level 1, which is equivalent to the sine-Gordon model on the cylinder. In particular, we reproduce the standard renormalisation group flow of the sine-Gordon model near the Kosterlitz--Thouless point to second order in the couplings, a result usually derived using Lagrangian/path-integral methods.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种针对二维圆柱面上量子场论的威尔逊重整化新方法，利用紫外端共形场论的自由场实现引入短程截断，并推导出耦合常数流的哈密顿类Polchinski方程；以SU(2) WZW模型的各向异性形变为例，成功再现了正弦-戈登模型在KT点附近的二阶重整化群流。
AI.motivation: 发展一种适用于二维量子场论、特别是基于哈密顿量而非路径积分的非微扰威尔逊重整化方法，弥补传统拉格朗日方法在某些情形下的局限性。
AI.method: 利用紫外端共形场论的自由场实现来构造威尔逊短距截断，建立哈密顿量的重整化群流方程（哈密顿类Polchinski方程），并应用于SU(2) WZW模型的边缘形变（等价于圆柱上的正弦-戈登模型）。
AI.result: 推导出普适的哈密顿型Polchinski方程；在正弦-戈登模型中，精确复现了Kosterlitz-Thouless点附近至耦合常数二阶的重整化群流。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为二维量子场论提供了真正非微扰、哈密顿框架下的威尔逊重整化工具，拓展了对边缘相关形变系统临界行为的理解，并验证了其与传统路径积分结果的一致性。

title: Multivariate time-series forecasting of ASTRI-Horn monitoring data: A Normal Behavior Model
summary: This study presents a Normal Behavior Model (NBM) developed to forecast monitoring time-series data from the ASTRI-Horn Cherenkov telescope under normal operating conditions. The analysis focused on 15 physical variables acquired by the Telescope Control Unit between September 2022 and July 2024, representing sensor measurements from the Azimuth and Elevation motors. After data cleaning, resampling, feature selection, and correlation analysis, the dataset was segmented into fixed-length intervals, in which the first I samples represented the input sequence provided to the model, while the forecast length, T, indicated the number of future time steps to be predicted. A sliding-window technique was then applied to increase the number of intervals. A Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP) was trained to perform multivariate forecasting across all features simultaneously. Model performance was evaluated using the Mean Squared Error (MSE) and the Normalized Median Absolute Deviation (NMAD), and it was also benchmarked against a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) network. The MLP model demonstrated consistent results across different features and I-T configurations, and matched the performance of the LSTM while converging faster. It achieved an MSE of 0.019+/-0.003 and an NMAD of 0.032+/-0.009 on the test set under its best configuration (4 hidden layers, 720 units per layer, and I-T lengths of 300 samples each, corresponding to 5 hours at 1-minute resolution). Extending the forecast horizon up to 6.5 hours-the maximum allowed by this configuration-did not degrade performance, confirming the model's effectiveness in providing reliable hour-scale predictions. The proposed NBM provides a powerful tool for enabling early anomaly detection in online ASTRI-Horn monitoring time series, offering a basis for the future development of a prognostics and health management system that supports predictive maintenance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种用于ASTRI-Horn切伦科夫望远镜监控时序数据的正常行为模型（NBM），基于多层感知机（MLP）实现多变量时间序列预测，在小时级预测任务中性能媲美LSTM且收敛更快，为在线异常检测与预测性维护提供支持。
AI.motivation: 为实现ASTRI-Horn望远镜运行状态的早期异常检测，并支撑未来预测性维护与健康管理系统（PHM）的构建，需建立能准确刻画其传感器数据正常行为的时间序列预测模型。
AI.method: 基于2022年9月至2024年7月采集的15个物理变量（方位/俯仰电机传感器数据），经清洗、重采样、特征选择与相关性分析后，采用滑动窗口将数据分段；以长度为I的历史序列输入，预测T步未来值；使用多层感知机（MLP）进行端到端多变量联合预测，并与LSTM对比评估。
