title: The Hydrostatic Mass Bias and the $σ_8$ Tension: A Multi-Probe Forecast for Stage-IV/V Surveys
summary: The hydrostatic mass bias ($b_{\mathrm{HSE}}$) is a leading systematic uncertainty in cluster cosmology and a principal source of degeneracy with $σ_8$ and $Ω_m$. We investigate the capability of Stage-IV CMB and optical surveys to calibrate $b_{\mathrm{HSE}}$ using tomographic cross-correlations between the thermal Sunyaev--Zel'dovich (tSZ) effect, galaxy clustering, and weak lensing. We perform a Fisher forecast incorporating realistic survey noise, foreground modeling for clustered CIB and radio sources, and full marginalization over cosmological and astrophysical nuisance parameters, including per-bin galaxy bias perturbations, photometric redshift shifts, intrinsic alignments, and baryonic feedback modeled with HMCode2020. With optimized tomographic binning (10 lens and 5 source bins for LSST; 6 lens and 5 source bins for CSST), we forecast marginalized constraints of $0.98\%$ for SO+LSST, $1.60\%$ for CMB-S4+LSST, and $2.40\%$ for CMB-S4+CSST. Tomography improves $b_{\mathrm{HSE}}$ precision by factors of approximately three relative to non-tomographic analyses, reflecting the role of redshift information in breaking the $b_{\mathrm{HSE}}$--$σ_8$ degeneracy. Optical-only probes provide no direct constraint on $b_{\mathrm{HSE}}$, whereas inclusion of tSZ-containing spectra enables percent-level calibration under realistic systematic assumptions. The results demonstrate that multi-probe tomographic analyses with Stage-IV surveys can achieve robust control of hydrostatic mass bias, strengthening cluster-based constraints on structure growth.

AI.tldr: 本文通过费舍尔预测分析了第四代CMB与光学巡天（如LSST、CSST）利用tSZ、星系团聚和弱引力透镜的层析交叉相关来校准星系团水静力学质量偏差b_HSE的能力，在考虑多种系统误差和参数简并后，预计可达到约1%量级的精度。
AI.motivation: 水静力学质量偏差b_HSE是星系团宇宙学中主要的系统误差来源，并与σ8和Ωm存在强简并，亟需高精度校准。
AI.method: 采用费舍尔矩阵预测方法，结合真实巡天噪声、前景建模（如CIB和射电源）、以及对宇宙学与天体物理烦扰参数（如星系偏置扰动、光度红移偏移、内禀对齐、HMCode2020描述的重子反馈）的完全边缘化；采用优化的层析红移分bin策略（如LSST用10个透镜+5个源bin）。
AI.result: 预测SO+LSST、CMB-S4+LSST、CMB-S4+CSST组合分别可达0.98%、1.60%、2.40%的b_HSE约束精度；层析分析相较非层析提升约3倍精度；仅光学探针无法约束b_HSE，而含tSZ谱的信息可实现百分比级校准。
AI.conclusion: 第四代多探针层析分析可稳健控制水静力学质量偏差，显著增强基于星系团的结构增长限制能力。

title: Hernquist distribution of matter as a source of black-hole geometry
summary: It was recently demonstrated that imposing the condition $P_{r} = -ρ$ on the radial pressure of a galactic halo can lead to regular black-hole solutions for certain density profiles, such as the Dehnen and Einasto models. In the present work, we show that some of the most commonly used halo profiles, including the Hernquist model, do not yield regular geometries under the same condition, but instead support black-hole solutions that retain a central singularity

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在径向压力Pr = -ρ条件下，不同星系晕密度剖面（如Dehnen、Einasto和Hernquist模型）对黑洞解正则性的影响；发现前两者可产生正则黑洞解，而Hernquist模型仍保留中心奇点。
AI.motivation: 探究不同常用星系晕密度剖面对在Pr = -ρ条件下是否能产生无奇点的正则黑洞解。
AI.method: 理论分析与比较研究，针对Dehnen、Einasto和Hernquist等常见晕模型，在Pr = -ρ约束下求解引力场方程并检验时空正则性。
AI.result: Dehnen和Einasto模型可导出正则黑洞解，而Hernquist模型在此条件下仍存在中心奇点。
AI.conclusion: 并非所有常用星系晕模型在Pr = -ρ条件下都能支持正则黑洞；黑洞解的正则性高度依赖于具体密度剖面的选择。

title: Feedback shaped the galaxy morphological sequence in presence of mergers
comment: Published in the Open Journal of Astrophysics
summary: Bulges and disks are major structural components that define galaxy morphology. The mass ratios of bulges and disks increase statistically with the galaxy mass, with the high-mass end occupied by elliptical galaxies. Although previous theoretical studies have succeeded in reproducing this morphological sequence, it is not yet fully understood why and how this morphological sequence emerged. Galaxy mergers accompanying dark matter halo mergers have been proposed as the major route for bulge formation. On the other hand, it is observationally known that the mass fraction of galaxies (stars plus cold gas) in dark matter halos attains the peak value at $M_{\rm halo} \sim 10^{12} {\rm M}_\odot$ throughout the cosmic time. Using a simple galaxy evolution model including mergers, we show that this feature is the fundamental cause of the morphological sequence. Halos hosting massive galaxies, which stay more massive than this peak mass for long periods during their growth, merge mostly with satellite halos having larger galaxy mass fractions than themselves. Such mergers increase the bulge mass fraction efficiently. In contrast, host halos of low-mass galaxies evolve under unfavorable condition for bulge growth because they stay below the peak mass and merge with satellite halos with smaller galaxy mass fractions. Previous studies suggest that the peak in galaxy mass fraction is created by feedback processes from active galactic nuclei (AGN) and young massive stars including supernovae (SN), which are considered to suppress star formation in high-mass and low-mass galaxies, respectively. This study thus points to a close relationship between the galaxy morphology and feedback processes which have hitherto been considered unrelated and suggests the importance of further investigation into their causal relationship.

AI.tldr: 本文提出暗物质晕中星系质量分数在 $M_{\rm halo} \sim 10^{12} {\rm M}_\odot$ 处达到峰值这一观测特征，是驱动星系形态序列（从盘主导到核球主导）的根本原因；通过含并合的简单星系演化模型，表明高于该质量的宿主晕倾向于与星系质量分数更高的卫星晕并合，从而高效增长核球比例，而低质量宿主晕则相反；该机制将星系形态演化与AGN和超新星反馈调控星系质量分数的过程联系起来。
AI.motivation: 尽管已有理论能复现星系形态序列（核球/盘质量比随总质量增大），但其物理起源尚不明确；尤其未厘清为何核球主导的椭圆星系集中在高质端，以及该序列如何由基本物理过程自然涌现。
AI.method: 构建一个包含并合过程的简化星系演化模型，结合观测约束——星系（恒星+冷气体）在暗物质晕中的质量分数在 $M_{\rm halo} \sim 10^{12} {\rm M}_\odot$ 处存在宇宙时间尺度上的峰值，并分析不同质量宿主晕与其卫星晕并合时的星系质量分数对比关系及其对核球增长的影响。
AI.result: 高于峰值质量（$\gtrsim 10^{12} {\rm M}_\odot$）的宿主晕长期维持高质状态，倾向于与星系质量分数更高的卫星晕并合，显著提升核球质量比；而低于该质量的宿主晕则与分数更低的卫星并合，核球增长受抑；由此自然导出观测到的形态序列。
AI.conclusion: 暗物质晕中星系质量分数的峰值是星系形态序列形成的根源；该结果首次建立了星系宏观形态结构与AGN及超新星反馈（决定该峰值的物理机制）之间的因果联系，提示需深入探究反馈—质量分数—形态三者间的演化链条。

title: Symbolic syzygy-constrained reduction rules for Feynman integrals and the LoopIn framework
summary: We present a new algorithm for integration-by-parts (IBP) reduction of Feynman integrals with high powers of numerators or propagators, a demanding computational step in evaluating multi-loop scattering amplitudes. The algorithm allows us to avoid a large intermediate system of equations and instead focus on applying direct reduction rules to the integrals. We demonstrate the application of our algorithm with some highly non-trivial examples, namely rank-20 integrals for the double box with an external mass and the massless pentabox. We also achieve much faster IBP reduction for an example of scattering amplitudes for spinning black hole binary systems. Finally, we present LoopIn, a modular framework for automating multi-loop calculations, where the IBP techniques described here can be interfaced.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的积分分部（IBP）约化算法，用于高效处理高幂次分子或传播子的费曼积分，显著减少中间方程组规模，并在双盒图、无质量五盒图及自旋黑洞双星散射振幅等复杂例子中验证了其高效性；同时介绍了模块化多圈计算框架LoopIn。
AI.motivation: 传统IBP约化在处理高幂次分子或传播子的费曼积分时面临中间方程组过大、计算效率低的问题，亟需更高效的约化方法。
AI.method: 提出一种新型IBP约化算法，避免构建庞大中间线性方程组，转而直接应用约化规则对积分进行简化；并开发了模块化多圈计算框架LoopIn以集成该技术。
AI.result: 成功处理了双盒图（含外质量）和无质量五盒图中的20阶秩积分，并显著加速了自旋黑洞双星系统散射振幅的IBP约化。
AI.conclusion: 新算法大幅提升了高复杂度费曼积分IBP约化的效率与可行性，为多圈散射振幅计算提供了实用工具，并通过LoopIn框架增强了自动化能力。

title: Improving calibration accuracy with torque coupled gravity field calibrator for sub-Hz gravitational wave observation in CHRONOS
summary:
A fundamental challenge in low-frequency gravitational-wave detectors is the limited signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) of calibration lines, particularly in torsion-bar systems where the response is governed by rotational dynamics. In this work, we resolve this issue by optimizing the geometrical configuration of a torque-coupled gravity field calibrator (GCal), achieving an improvement in calibration-line SNR by more than an order of magnitude compared to conventional layouts.
  For the Cryogenic sub-Hz cROss torsion-bar detector with quantum NOn-demolition Speed-meter (CHRONOS), the calibration signal appears as a monochromatic line within the $0.1$--$10~\mathrm{Hz}$ band. At $1~\mathrm{Hz}$, the strain-equivalent calibration amplitude reaches $|h_{\rm GCal}| = 1.18 \times 10^{-14}$, corresponding to an SNR density of $|h_{\rm GCal}|/S_h = 4.25 \times 10^{3}$. This demonstrates for the first time that a high-SNR calibration line can be directly injected into the sub-Hz band of a torsion-bar detector.
  A first-order perturbative error propagation analysis yields a total fractional systematic uncertainty of $δh_{\rm GCal}/h_{\rm GCal} = 0.24\%$, dominated by geometric alignment uncertainties, while contributions from mass uncertainties and the gravitational constant remain subdominant. The corresponding absolute systematic uncertainty is $δh_{\rm GCal} \sim 10^{-17}$ at $1~\mathrm{Hz}$.
  These results establish torque-coupled gravitational calibration as a practical solution to the longstanding low-SNR problem in sub-Hz torsion-bar detectors and provide a robust pathway toward precision absolute calibration in the low-frequency regime.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种优化扭矩耦合重力场校准器（GCal）几何构型的方法，显著提升了亚赫兹频段扭杆式引力波探测器中校准线的信噪比（SNR），并实现了高精度绝对校准。
AI.motivation: 低频引力波探测器（尤其是扭杆系统）中校准线信噪比（SNR）低，限制了其校准精度和可靠性。
AI.method: 通过优化扭矩耦合重力场校准器（GCal）的几何构型，提升其在亚赫兹频段（0.1–10 Hz）对扭杆探测器的校准效率；结合CHRONOS探测器参数进行建模与误差传播分析。
AI.result: 在校准频率1 Hz处，应变等效校准幅度达|h_GCal| = 1.18×10⁻¹⁴，SNR密度达4.25×10³；系统总分数不确定度为0.24%，主导来源为几何对准误差；绝对系统不确定度约为10⁻¹⁷。
AI.conclusion: 该方法首次在亚赫兹扭杆探测器中实现高SNR直接校准，为低频引力波探测器提供了实用、鲁棒的高精度绝对校准路径。

title: Primordial Black Hole Formation in Rastall Gravity: Shifted Collapse Threshold and Exponential Abundance Sensitivity
summary: Primordial black holes formed in the early universe are compelling candidates for dark matter. We investigate their production in Rastall gravity, a modification of general relativity that introduces a non-minimal coupling between matter and geometry through the non-conservation of the energy-momentum tensor. Analyz- ing cosmological perturbations during radiation domination, we demonstrate that the Rastall parameter fundamentally alters the collapse dynamics, modifying the growth of density fluctuations, the critical threshold for black hole formation, and the fluctuation amplitude at horizon crossing. Current cosmological constraints from Big Bang Nucleosynthesis, the cosmic microwave background, and large-scale structure restrict the Rastall parameter to small values, yet within this allowed range PBH production can be altered by orders of magnitude compared to general relativity. Our results establish primordial black holes as novel probes of modified gravity.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Rastall引力理论下原初黑洞（PBH）的产生机制，发现Rastall参数显著改变密度扰动增长、黑洞形成临界阈值及涨落振幅，使PBH产量相比广义相对论可变化若干数量级；尽管当前宇宙学观测限制该参数取值较小，PBH仍可作为检验修正引力的新探针。
AI.motivation: 原初黑洞是暗物质的有力候选者，而Rastall引力作为广义相对论的一种修正形式，可能显著影响其产生机制，亟需系统研究。
AI.method: 在辐射主导时期分析宇宙学扰动，研究Rastall引力中能量-动量张量非守恒所导致的物质与几何非最小耦合对PBH形成动力学的影响。
AI.result: Rastall参数从根本上改变了PBH的塌缩动力学，包括密度扰动增长、形成临界阈值和视界穿越时的涨落幅度；在BBN、CMB和大尺度结构等观测约束下，允许参数范围内PBH产量可比广义相对论改变若干数量级。
AI.conclusion: 原初黑洞可作为探测Rastall类修正引力理论的新颖宇宙学探针。

title: Thermal aspects and particle dynamics of Euler-Heisenberg AdS black hole in 4D Einstein Gauss-Bonnet gravity
summary: We construct charged AdS black hole solutions in four dimensional Einstein Gauss Bonnet gravity coupled to Euler Heisenberg nonlinear electrodynamics and investigate their physical properties. The modified field equations admit black hole solutions whose horizon structure is significantly affected by higher-curvature and nonlinear electromagnetic corrections, allowing for multiple horizons depending on the model parameters. In the extended phase space, where the cosmological constant is interpreted as thermodynamic pressure, we analyze the thermodynamic behavior and show that both the Gauss Bonnet coupling and the Euler Heisenberg parameter induce notable modifications in the equation of state, critical behavior, and thermal stability. Interpreting the black hole mass as enthalpy, we study the Joule-Thomson expansion and determine the inversion temperature and pressure, demonstrating that higher curvature and nonlinear electrodynamic effects substantially influence the cooling and heating regions. Finally, we examine time-like geodesics and show that Gauss Bonnet corrections significantly modify the effective potential, orbital stability, and particle motion in the strong-field regime

AI.tldr: 本文构建了四维爱因斯坦-高斯-博内引力耦合欧拉-海森堡非线性电动力学下的带电AdS黑洞解，并系统研究其热力学性质（包括相变、焦耳-汤姆孙效应）和强场中类时测地线运动特性。
AI.motivation: 探索高曲率修正（高斯-博内项）与非线性电磁效应（欧拉-海森堡理论）共同作用下，AdS黑洞的结构、热力学及强场引力效应如何被显著改变。
AI.method: 求解修正后的爱因斯坦-麦克斯韦场方程，获得解析/数值黑洞解；在扩展热力学相空间中分析P-V临界行为、热稳定性及焦耳-汤姆孙系数；计算有效势与类时测地线以研究粒子轨道稳定性。
AI.result: 发现参数依赖的多事件视界结构；高斯-博内与欧拉-海森堡参数共同改写状态方程、临界点及冷却/加热区域；高斯-博内项显著改变强场中粒子的有效势与轨道稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 高曲率与非线性电磁效应不可忽略，二者协同深刻影响AdS黑洞的几何结构、热力学相变行为及强引力场中的粒子动力学，为检验量子引力效应提供了新途径。

title: Kaon decay constraints on vector bosons coupled to non-conserved currents
summary: We study rare three- and four-body kaon decays as a probe of light vector and axial-vector bosons coupled to non-conserved currents. We find that searches for $K_L \to π^0 π^0 (X\to e^+e^-)$ decays constrain the couplings of light $X$ bosons to light quarks to be as small as $\mathcal{O}(10^{-5})$. The charged-pion modes $K^+ \to π^+ π^0 (X \to e^+e^-)$ and $K_L \to π^+ π^- (X \to e^+e^-)$ provide weaker limits, but constrain complementary combinations of couplings to the $u$, $d$, and $s$ quarks at the level of $\mathcal{O}(10^{-4})$. Finally, we also find that double emission of $X$ in $K \to πXX$ decays can provide yet additional constraints on the parameter space of light $X$ bosons due to a double $(m_K/m_X)^2$ enhancement to the rate. For a 17 MeV boson, these limits add to the known tension between spin-1 bosons coupled to vector and axial-vector currents interpretations of the results of the ATOMKI experiment with meson decay data. Finally, we also comment on negative pion capture on hydrogen and deuterium as a source of light particles and discuss the prospects for testing the 17 MeV boson hypothesis.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了稀有三体和四体K介子衰变，以探测与非守恒流耦合的轻矢量和轴矢量玻色子，并给出了对轻X玻色子与轻夸克耦合强度的严格限制。
AI.motivation: 利用稀有K介子衰变作为探针，检验轻矢量/轴矢量玻色子（如ATOMKI实验中提出的17 MeV候选者）与夸克的耦合，解决其与现有介子衰变数据之间的张力问题。
AI.method: 通过分析K_L→π⁰π⁰(X→e⁺e⁻)、K⁺→π⁺π⁰(X→e⁺e⁻)、K_L→π⁺π⁻(X→e⁺e⁻)及K→πXX等稀有衰变过程，结合相空间因子与耦合依赖关系，推导对X玻色子-夸克耦合常数的实验限制。
AI.result: K_L→π⁰π⁰(X→e⁺e⁻)将X与轻夸克耦合限制至O(10⁻⁵)量级；带电模式给出O(10⁻⁴)量级互补约束；K→πXX因双重(m_K/m_X)²增强效应提供额外约束；17 MeV玻色子模型与ATOMKI结果存在与介子衰变数据的紧张关系；并讨论了负π介子俘获作为轻粒子源的可能性。
AI.conclusion: 稀有K介子衰变是检验轻新玻色子物理的强有力工具，当前分析显著压缩了轻矢量/轴矢量玻色子参数空间，尤其加剧了17 MeV解释与已有强子数据之间的矛盾，未来需结合核俘获实验进一步验证。

title: BayeSED-GALAXIES II. Bayesian full spectrum analysis of galaxies and application in the CSST wide-field slitless spectroscopy survey
comment: 38 pages, including 16 figures and 2 tables; accepted for publication in ApJS. The mock CSST data for ~100,000 galaxies utilized in this work will be publicly available at https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17221343/. A Python script for an in-depth comparison between BayeSED3 and BAGPIPES is available at https://github.com/hanyk/BayeSED3/blob/main/tests/test_bayesed_bagpipes_comparison.py
summary: The China Space Station Telescope (CSST) will conduct wide-field multiband photometric imaging and slitless spectroscopic surveys, advancing cosmology and galaxy evolution studies. Achieving CSST's cosmological goals requires precise redshifts ($σ_{\rm NMAD}\lesssim 0.002-0.005$) from low-resolution ($R\sim200$) and potentially blended slitless spectra. We present BayeSED3, extended for Bayesian full-spectrum analysis, including nebular emission modeling (via \textsc{Cloudy}) and a Bayesian treatment of the model scaling factor, improving reliability over optimization methods for low SNR spectra. Validated on realistic mock data generated with the CESS emulator (median SNR=1.65, including instrumental and self-blending effects), our method achieves excellent redshift precision with three-band (GU+GV+GI) spectroscopy: $σ_{\rm NMAD}=0.0008$ ($\sim$80% success) for star-forming and $σ_{\rm NMAD}=0.0015$ ($\sim$50% success) for quiescent galaxies. Stellar mass ($σ_{\rm NMAD}\approx0.015$ dex for SF, $\approx0.016$ dex for quiescent) and SFR ($σ_{\rm NMAD}\approx0.05$ dex for SF, especially at SNR>1) are reliably recovered. Self-blending increases scatter by $\gtrsim30%$, but combining spectroscopy with CSST's seven-band photometry significantly improves accuracy, especially for quiescent galaxies and data-limited cases. Single-band spectroscopy plus photometry yields reasonable redshifts: GU+photometry is limited, GI+photometry gives >60% (SF) and >40% (quiescent) success at $σ_{\rm NMAD}\lesssim0.002$, GV+photometry gives >35% (SF) and $\sim$40% (quiescent) at similar precision. The Bayesian framework offers a powerful method for accurate galaxy characterization, enhancing CSST's scientific outcomes despite the challenges of slitless spectroscopy.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了BayeSED3方法，用于中国空间站望远镜（CSST）的 slitless 光谱数据的贝叶斯全谱分析，结合星云发射建模与模型缩放因子的贝叶斯处理，在低信噪比和自混合条件下显著提升红移与物理参数（如恒星质量、SFR）的测量精度。
AI.motivation: CSST将开展宽视场多波段测光与无狭缝光谱巡天，但其低分辨率（R~200）、低信噪比及光谱自混合效应给精确红移测量（σ_NMAD ≲ 0.002–0.005）带来巨大挑战，亟需更鲁棒的光谱分析方法。
AI.method: 提出BayeSED3：基于贝叶斯框架的全谱拟合方法，集成Cloudy星云发射模型，并对模型通量缩放因子进行贝叶斯推断（而非传统优化），以提升低SNR下的稳健性；使用CESS模拟器生成含仪器效应与自混合的真实感模拟数据进行验证。
AI.result: 在三波段（GU+GV+GI）slitless光谱下，对恒星形成星系实现σ_NMAD=0.0008（成功率~80%），对宁静星系达σ_NMAD=0.0015（~50%）；恒星质量和SFR恢复精度分别为≈0.015–0.016 dex与≈0.05 dex；自混合使散射增大约30%，但联合CSST七波段测光可显著改善，尤其对宁静星系；单波段光谱+测光亦可达到可用精度（如GI+photometry对SF/Quiescent成功率>60%/>40%）。
AI.conclusion: BayeSED3为CSST slitless光谱提供了高精度、高稳健性的物理参数反演框架，有效应对低SNR与光谱混合难题，大幅提升其在宇宙学与星系演化研究中的科学产出能力。

title: Five-point Type IIB String Amplitudes at One Loop
summary: Massless type IIB superstring amplitudes are organized according to the number of external states and their ${\mathrm U}(1)$ charge under the R-symmetry of type IIB supergravity. In this work, we analyze the low-energy expansion of one-loop five-point amplitudes in all charge sectors, focusing on the representative processes involving five gravitons and four gravitons with one dilaton. We compute the one-loop contributions to the moduli-dependent couplings in the type IIB effective action up to the $D^{12}R^5$ and $D^{14}φR^4$ interactions. The results are consistent with $S$-duality constraints in every charge sector and exhibit rich arithmetic structure, including single-valued multiple zeta values, affine linear combinations of logarithmic derivatives of the Riemann zeta function at odd integers, and a new constant of currently unknown nature.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了IIB型超弦理论中一环五点振幅的低能展开，计算了模依赖耦合项至D^{12}R^5和D^{14}φR^4阶，并验证其满足S对偶性，揭示了多重zeta值等丰富算术结构。
AI.motivation: 理解IIB型超弦振幅的低能展开及其在有效作用量中的体现，特别是满足S-对偶性约束并揭示其中的算术结构。
AI.method: 系统分析一环五点振幅在不同U(1)荷扇区的低能展开，重点计算五引力子与四引力子加一标量（胀子）过程，提取模依赖耦合至D^{12}R^5和D^{14}φR^4阶。
AI.result: 所得模依赖耦合严格满足各荷扇区的S-对偶性；结果包含单值多重zeta值、黎曼zeta函数在奇整数处对数导数的仿射线性组合，以及一个目前性质未知的新常数。
AI.conclusion: IIB型超弦一环五点振幅的低能结构不仅受强对称性（S-对偶）约束，还蕴含深层算术特征，为探索量子引力与数论的联系提供了新线索。

title: Cosmic strings and domain walls: the impact of CMB $B$-mode data
summary: We analyse CMB constraints on stable networks of cosmic strings and domain walls using for the first time full Planck 2018 data together with BICEP/Keck 2018 $B$-mode measurements. The defect-induced anisotropies are computed using the Unconnected Segment Model for Nambu-Goto and Abelian-Higgs strings, as well as for stable domain walls, and included in a full Markov Chain Monte Carlo analysis jointly varying all $Λ$CDM parameters, the tensor-to-scalar ratio, and the string/domain wall tension. No statistically significant evidence for defects is found, although we observe a mild preference for non-zero cosmic string tension. Our results improve previous constraints on the defect power spectrum by up to a factor of two. In the particular case of strings, the improvement is driven by the $B$-mode data, and is especially pronounced for Abelian-Higgs strings. We also present forecasts for upcoming Simons Observatory data and find that, with the baseline noise configuration, the constraints on the string tension could improve by about a factor of three. Finally, we assess the impact of Nambu-Goto string loops on CMB anisotropies in light of both current and future observations.

AI.tldr: 本文利用Planck 2018和BICEP/Keck 2018 B模数据，首次对宇宙弦和畴壁等稳定拓扑缺陷进行CMB约束分析，未发现显著证据，但轻微倾向非零弦张力；结果将缺陷功率谱限制提升了至多两倍，尤其Abelian-Higgs弦受B模数据推动明显；还预测了Simons Observatory未来可将弦张力限制再提升约三倍，并评估了Nambu-Goto弦圈对CMB的影响。
AI.motivation: 探索宇宙早期相变可能产生的稳定拓扑缺陷（如宇宙弦、畴壁）在CMB中的观测印记，检验其存在性并收紧参数约束。
AI.method: 采用Unconnected Segment Model计算各类缺陷（Nambu-Goto弦、Abelian-Higgs弦、稳定畴壁）引发的CMB各向异性，并结合Planck 2018温度/极化数据与BICEP/Keck 2018 B模数据，开展联合ΛCDM参数、张量标量比及缺陷张力的马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛（MCMC）分析。
AI.result: 未发现统计显著的缺陷信号；但存在对非零宇宙弦张力的轻微偏好；缺陷功率谱约束较以往提升达2倍，其中Abelian-Higgs弦的改进主要源于B模数据；Simons Observatory预报可使弦张力约束再提升约3倍；Nambu-Goto弦圈对当前及未来CMB观测影响有限。
AI.conclusion: 当前CMB数据不支持稳定宇宙弦或畴壁的存在，但尚未完全排除；更灵敏的B模观测（如Simons Observatory）将是进一步检验拓扑缺陷的关键。

title: Inertial Frame Dragging as a Probe to Differentiate Kerr-Newman Naked Singularities from Black Holes
summary: We investigate inertial frame dragging and relativistic precession in the Kerr--Newman spacetime and show how gyroscopic observables can operationally discriminate between Kerr--Newman black holes and Kerr--Newman naked singularities. We study a test gyroscope attached to a stationary observer and derive closed-form expressions for the Lense--Thirring, geodetic, and general spin-precession frequencies. A sharp qualitative distinction emerges: for Kerr--Newman black holes, the spin-precession frequency generically diverges as the horizon is approached (remaining finite only for the ZAMO family), whereas for Kerr--Newman naked singularities, the precession remains finite throughout the spacetime, with divergences confined to the ring singularity on the equatorial plane. Working with physically admissible stationary observers (including ZAMOs), we first construct the timelike geodesic motion and the fundamental orbital frequencies for equatorial circular orbits. Using these, we analyse the radial and vertical epicyclic frequencies, the ISCO shift induced by the charge parameter $Q$, and the associated periastron and nodal precession frequencies relevant to quasi-periodic oscillations (QPOs). We demonstrate that nonzero $Q$ produces systematic, and in rapidly rotating regimes nontrivial, modifications to the frequency hierarchy: $ν_{\rm nod}$ can develop a finite maximum at $r=r_p=\mathcal{O}(M)$, its peak amplitude decreases with increasing $Q$, and sign reversals may occur for sufficiently large charge and high spin, signalling a reversal of nodal-precession orientation. These results establish spin-precession behaviour as a robust strong-field probe of horizons versus exposed singularities, with potential implications for testing cosmic censorship using future high-precision precession/QPO measurements.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Kerr-Newman时空中的惯性系拖曳和相对论进动，通过陀螺仪观测量区分黑洞与裸奇点，并分析了电荷参数对轨道频率和准周期振荡（QPO）相关进动的影响。
AI.motivation: 旨在利用陀螺仪可观测量在强场区域操作性地区分Kerr-Newman黑洞与裸奇点，并检验宇宙审查假说。
AI.method: 研究静止观测者所附测试陀螺仪的Lense-Thirring、测地线及总自旋进动频率；推导赤道圆轨道的类时测地运动与基本轨道频率；分析径向与垂直方向的环频率、ISCO偏移、近心点与节点进动频率。
AI.result: 发现黑洞情形下自旋进动频率在视界附近通常发散（仅ZAMO族有限），而裸奇点情形下进动频率在整个时空有限（仅在赤道平面上的环奇点发散）；电荷Q导致节点进动频率ν_nod出现有限极大值、幅值减小甚至符号反转。
AI.conclusion: 自旋进动行为可作为区分视界与暴露奇点的稳健强场探针，对未来高精度进动/QPO观测检验宇宙审查假说具有重要意义。

title: Form factors of $Δ$(1232) and the electromagnetic $N-Δ$ transition
summary: In this work, the electromagnetic and gravitational form factors of $Δ$ isobars, as well as the electromagnetic $N-Δ$ transition form factors are studied systematically and continuously using a covariant quark-diquark approach with the pion cloud effect. In our model, the baryon is treated as the two-body system to simplify calculations, and the quarks are assumed to be surrounded by the pion cloud. The related physical properties, such as the charge radius and magnetic moment of $Δ$ and the helicity amplitudes of the $N-Δ$ transition are obtained and discussed. Our results for the form factors of both $Δ$(1232) and the electromagnetic $N-Δ$ transition are in reasonable agreement with the experimental or lattice results. Moreover, we found that the pion cloud plays an important role in the results through enlarging the magnetic transition form factor $G_M(t)$ and shifting the sign of the D-term of $Δ$ to negative.

AI.tldr: 本文使用协变夸克-二夸克模型并考虑π介子云效应，系统研究了Δ重子的电磁和引力形状因子以及核子-Δ跃迁的电磁形状因子。结果表明，π介子云对磁跃迁形状因子G_M(t)有显著增强作用，并使Δ的D项符号变为负，理论结果与实验及格点QCD数据基本一致。
AI.motivation: 深入理解Δ重子及其与核子间电磁跃迁的内部结构和动力学机制，特别是π介子云在其中的作用。
AI.method: 采用协变夸克-二夸克两体模型，引入π介子云效应，计算Δ重子的电磁/引力形状因子及N-Δ电磁跃迁形状因子，并导出电荷半径、磁矩、螺旋度振幅等可观测量。
AI.result: 成功得到Δ(1232)和N-Δ跃迁的形状因子，与实验和格点QCD结果符合良好；发现π介子云显著增大磁跃迁形状因子G_M(t)，并使Δ的D项由正变负。
AI.conclusion: π介子云是描述Δ重子结构及N-Δ跃迁不可忽略的关键效应，该模型为理解重子激发态的强子结构提供了有效框架。

title: SMMAN: quasi-Simultaneous Multi-wavelength Monitoring of gamma-ray-loud AGNs with the Nanshan 26-m radio telescope
comment: 46 pages, 18 figures, 3 machine readable tables. Accepted for publication in ApJS
summary: Active Galactic Nuclei (AGNs) are characterized by strong temporal flux density variability across the electromagnetic spectrum, offering insights into the complex physical processes governing accretion and plasma outflows. To systematically investigate AGNs flux density variability in radio bands, a long-term program was initiated in late 2016: quasi-Simultaneous Multiwavelength Monitoring of gamma-ray-loud AGNs with the Nanshan 26-m radio telescope (SMMAN). This work presents the first data release of the SMMAN program, spanning over eight years from 2016 to 2024 with observations at 4.8 and 23.6 GHz. The SMMAN sample includes 131 northern ($δ>\sim0^{\circ}$) sources selected from the Fermi Large Area Telescope third source catalog. The characteristics of variability, spectral index, luminosity, and $γ$-ray loudness factor are examined for different AGN classes within the sample. Target sources exhibit stronger variability at 23.6 GHz compared to 4.8 GHz, with BL Lac objects being more variable than flat-spectrum radio quasars (FSRQs). BL Lacs generally have flatter radio spectra, while FSRQs, blazar candidates of uncertain type (BCUs), and radio galaxies (RDGs) span a wider range from flat to steep. FSRQs are more radio-luminous than BL Lacs and other classes, with BCUs intermediate and RDGs generally fainter. FSRQs and BL Lacs have higher $γ$-ray loudness factors than RDGs, while BCUs have intermediate values. The SMMAN dataset, incorporated with other historical and ongoing monitoring programs, will provide a unique opportunity to investigate the evolution of spectral energy distributions, search for quasi-periodic oscillations, and analyze supermassive black hole binary systems.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了SMMAN项目首个数据发布，涵盖2016–2024年对131个北天γ射线明亮AGN在4.8和23.6 GHz的长期射电监测结果，分析了不同AGN子类（如BL Lac、FSRQ等）的变异性、谱指数、光度及γ射线响度特征。
AI.motivation: 系统研究射电波段AGN的流量密度时变特性，以深入理解吸积与喷流等物理过程，并为研究SED演化、准周期振荡及超大质量黑洞双星系统提供高质量数据基础。
AI.method: 基于南山26米射电望远镜开展准同时多波段监测（SMMAN），对Fermi-LAT第三版源表中131个北天γ射线明亮AGN进行长达八年（2016–2024）、双频（4.8和23.6 GHz）观测，统计分析其变幅、谱指数、射电光度和γ射线响度因子。
AI.result: 发现23.6 GHz变异性显著强于4.8 GHz；BL Lac比FSRQ更易变且谱更平；FSRQ射电光度最高，RDG最弱；γ射线响度：FSRQ ≈ BL Lac > BCU > RDG。
AI.conclusion: SMMAN首期数据集为AGN射电变异性研究提供了关键资源，并将助力SED演化、QPO探测及黑洞双星等前沿课题。

title: Instanton Solutions of the Topological A-model Dual to Free Super-Yang-Mills
summary: A topological A-model constructed from supertwistor variables and a worldsheet U(1) gauge field was recently proposed to describe the $AdS_5\times S^5$ superstring at zero radius which is dual to free N=4 d=4 super-Yang-Mills. In this note, holomorphic worldsheet instanton solutions of the supertwistor variables are constructed where the U(1) worldsheet gauge field is identified with the square-root of the Strebel differential that describes the ribbon graph on the worldsheet.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了基于超扭量变量和世界面U(1)规范场的拓扑A模型，用于描述零半径下的AdS5×S5超弦，并将其与自由N=4 d=4超杨-米尔斯理论对偶；进一步构造了超扭量变量的全纯世界面瞬子解，并将U(1)规范场识别为描述世界面上丝带图的Strebel微分的平方根。
AI.motivation: 为理解AdS5×S5超弦在零半径极限下与自由N=4超杨-米尔斯理论的对偶关系，需建立一个可处理的世界面拓扑模型。
AI.method: 基于超扭量变量和世界面U(1)规范场构建拓扑A模型，并求解其全纯世界面瞬子解；将U(1)规范场与Strebel微分的平方根相联系，以刻画世界面上的丝带图结构。
AI.result: 成功构造了超扭量变量的全纯世界面瞬子解，并确立了U(1)规范场与Strebel微分平方根之间的对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 该拓扑A模型及其瞬子解为AdS/CFT对偶在零半径极限下的几何与拓扑描述提供了新工具，强化了超扭量方法在弦论与规范理论对偶中的作用。

authors: Elisabete M. de Gouveia Dal Pino
title: Testing the Spacetime Geometry of Sgr A* with the Relativistic Orbit of S2 star
summary: In this work, we perform a relativistic test of the spacetime geometry of Sagittarius A* (Sgr A*) using the orbit of the S2 star. We consider a broad class of compact object models, including Schwarzschild, Reissner-Nordström, Bardeen, Hayward, and Simpson-Visser black holes, as well as the Janis-Newman-Winicour naked singularity spacetime. For each geometry, we integrate the timelike geodesic equations and consistently project the resulting trajectories onto astrometric and spectroscopic observables, incorporating Rømer time delay and relativistic redshift effects. The theoretical predictions are tested with current Very Large Telescope (VLT) observations of the S2 star, while simultaneously imposing constraints from the Event Horizon Telescope shadow size. We find that several spacetimes that are degenerate at the level of shadow imaging, most notably Schwarzschild, Reissner-Nordström, and Bardeen regular black hole geometries, remain statistically indistinguishable when tested against present S2 data. We further carry out a statistical model comparison based on the Akaike and Bayesian information criteria (AIC and BIC) to evaluate the relative performance of the alternative spacetime models. Our analysis also constrains the generalized charge like parameter $q/M$ in non-Schwarzschild spacetimes based on current S2 star observations, and identifies specific black hole and horizonless geometries that can be further tested with forthcoming high precision astrometric observations from the VLT and Keck telescopes.

AI.tldr: 本文利用S2恒星轨道对银河系中心超大质量黑洞Sgr A*的时空几何进行了相对论检验，通过拟合VLT观测数据并结合EHT阴影尺寸约束，比较了多种黑洞与裸奇点模型，并利用AIC/BIC准则评估模型优劣，同时限制了非史瓦西时空中的广义电荷参数q/M。
AI.motivation: 检验广义相对论在强引力场下的适用性，区分不同紧凑天体（如各类黑洞和裸奇点）的时空几何模型。
AI.method: 数值求解各类时空（Schwarzschild、Reissner-Nordström、Bardeen等）中的类时测地线方程，将轨道投影到天体测量与光谱观测量上，纳入Rømer时间延迟和相对论红移效应，并联合VLT的S2星观测数据与EHT黑洞阴影尺寸进行统计拟合与模型比较（AIC/BIC）。
AI.result: 当前S2数据无法区分Schwarzschild、Reissner-Nordström和Bardeen等在阴影成像上简并的时空；给出了q/M等参数的观测限制；指出了若干可在未来高精度观测中进一步检验的模型。
AI.conclusion: 仅靠当前S2轨道数据尚不足以区分多种理论时空模型，需更高精度的天体测量数据（如VLT/Keck升级后）来打破简并，从而更严格检验强场引力理论。

title: Three-body molecular states composed of $D^{(*)}$ and two nucleons
summary: We study the three-body systems $DNN$ and $D^{*}NN$ within a hadronic molecular framework by combining a realistic nucleon-nucleon interaction with a $D^{(*)}N$ potential constrained by heavy-quark symmetry. The three-body Schrödinger equation is solved with the Gaussian Expansion Method, and the analytic structure of the spectrum is investigated using the Complex Scaling Method. We find that the $DNN$ system supports a robust and compact bound state in the $I(J^{P})=\tfrac{1}{2}(1^-)$ channel over a broad range of cutoff values, even when the corresponding $DN$ subsystem is weakly bound or unbound. For $D^{*}NN$, the spin-$1$ nature of the heavy meson and the associated spin-dependent forces generate a clear spin hierarchy: deeply bound states appear in both $0^-$ and $2^-$ channels, while the $1^-$ channel exhibits a characteristic two-branch pattern with a strongly bound compact branch and a more weakly bound, spatially extended branch. The root-mean-square radii indicate pronounced spatial compression compared with the deuteron scale, highlighting the cooperative roles of realistic $NN$ correlations, the $D^{(*)}N$ interactions, and heavy-quark symmetry in forming compact heavy-flavor few-body bound states. No three-body resonances under complex scaling are found in the explored parameter space. Our results provide quantitative benchmarks for future experimental searches for such charmed-meson-nuclear bound states.

AI.tldr: 本文在强子分子框架下研究了DNN和D*NN三体系统，发现DNN在I(J^P)=1/2(1^-)通道中存在鲁棒致密束缚态，D*NN则因自旋依赖力展现出清晰的自旋层次结构；所有束缚态均显著压缩，未发现三体共振态。
AI.motivation: 探索含重味介子（D/D*）与核子组成的少体束缚态，检验重夸克对称性及核力在重味强子物理中的作用，并为实验寻找提供理论基准。
AI.method: 结合现实核子-核子相互作用与基于重夸克对称性约束的D(*)N势，在高斯展开法求解三体薛定谔方程基础上，采用复标度法分析能谱解析结构。
AI.result: DNN在I(J^P)=1/2(1^-)通道中存在鲁棒致密束缚态，即使DN子系统弱束缚或无束缚；D*NN在0^-和2^-通道出现深束缚态，在1^-通道呈现双支结构（一为致密强束缚，一为延展弱束缚）；所有束缚态均比氘核尺度显著压缩；未发现三体共振态。
AI.conclusion: 现实NN关联、D(*)N相互作用与重夸克对称性协同促成致密重味少体束缚态；结果为未来实验探测此类粲介子-核束缚态提供了定量理论依据。

title: Probing dark matter distributions with the pericentre precession of the stellar orbits near the Galactic Centre black hole
comment: 15 pages, 5 figures, 3 tables, Accepted for publication in MNRAS
summary: The Galactic Centre black hole provides a naive environment for understanding unknown matter distribution and new gravitational physics. For this stellar orbits in the nuclear star cluster are reliable probes. We investigate different dark matter mass profiles through pericentre shift of stellar orbits near the black hole. We also study capability of existing and upcoming astrometric facilities to detect dark matter induced precession and to distinguish between several dark matter profiles. Parameters of different dark matter density profiles are estimated by using the most recent upper bound on dark mass near the black hole. These profiles are then used for calculating the gravitational potential and hence the relativistic pericentre shift of both low and high eccentricity orbits of 13 S-stars. We use the recently measured deviation parameter $f_{sp}$ for investigating competition between dark matter and gravitational physics within S2's orbit. The astrometric shift of the pericentres has been calculated and compared with existing and upcoming astrometric capabilities of large and extremely large telescopes. The orbit of S2 is found to be insensitive to dark matter induced precession. Low eccentricity and wider orbits are prominent probes for measuring dark matter induced precession which is accessible to present and upcoming astrometric facilities such as Keck, GRAVITY and TMT. The existing and upcoming facilities can distinguish between different dark matter profiles for some stars and hence they posses the capability to distinguish between possible formation histories of the central region of our Galaxy.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了银河系中心黑洞附近恒星轨道的近心点进动，以探测暗物质分布并区分不同暗物质密度模型，发现低偏心率、较宽轨道的S星（如S2以外的其他S星）是更灵敏的探针，现有及未来测角设施（如Keck、GRAVITY、TMT）有望区分不同暗物质模型。
AI.motivation: 银河系中心黑洞为探索未知物质分布和新引力物理提供了理想环境，而核星团中恒星轨道是可靠的探针；亟需评估其对暗物质诱导进动的敏感性及当前/未来观测设备的分辨能力。
AI.method: 基于最新暗质量上限约束不同暗物质密度轮廓参数，构建引力势，计算13颗S星（含高低偏心率轨道）的广义相对论近心点进动；结合S2星的偏差参数f_sp分析暗物质与新引力物理的竞争；并估算近心点的天体测量位移，与Keck、GRAVITY、TMT等设备精度对比。
AI.result: S2轨道对暗物质诱导进动不敏感；低偏心率、较宽轨道的S星进动信号更强，可被现有及未来设施（如Keck、GRAVITY、TMT）探测并用于区分不同暗物质模型。
AI.conclusion: 银河系中心区域的暗物质分布可通过低偏心率S星的近心点进动进行有效限制，且现有与下一代测角设备具备区分不同暗物质形成历史的能力。

title: The asymptotic charges of Curtright dual graviton and Curtright extensions of BMS algebra
summary: This paper studies the asymptotic gauge charges of the Curtright mixed-symmetry rank-3 field $φ_{[ρσ]ν}$ in Minkowski spacetime, interpreted in $ D = 5 $ as the dual graviton. In Bondi coordinates at future null infinity, we impose radiation fall-offs and fix a de Donder-like gauge together with an on-shell traceless condition, similarly to what happens in linearized gravity. Surface charges associated with the residual gauge transformations are constructed as boundary integrals via Nöther's 2-form. In $ D = 5 $, exploiting Hodge/Hodge-like decompositions on $ S^{3} $, the charge splits into a scalar sector $ Q_Φ $, a vector sector $ Q_{V} $ and a TT sector $Q_{y^{\text{TT}}}$. $ Q_Φ $ is parametrized by a single arbitrary scalar function $ Φ$ (interpreted as the supertranslation-like parameter), $ Q_{V} $ is parametrized by a vector field $ V^{i} \in \mathfrak{Diff}(S^{3}) $ and the TT sector $Q_{y^{\text{TT}}}$ is parametrized by a trasverse-traceless rank-2 tensor $y_{ij}^{\text{TT}} \in \mathfrak{TT}(S^3)$. The corresponding charge algebra closes only if $V_i \in \mathfrak{o}(4)$ as semidirect sum $ \mathfrak{o}(4) \loplus (C^{\infty}(S^3) \oplus \mathfrak{TT}(S^3)) $, i.e an abelian extension of a $\mathfrak{BMS}$-like algebra featuring a higher-spin-like supertranslation sector.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Curtright混合对称秩-3场在5维闵氏时空未来零无穷远处的渐近规范荷，将其解释为对偶引力子；通过诺特定理构造边界积分形式的表面荷，并分解为标量、矢量和横迹（TT）三个部分；其电荷代数闭合要求矢量参数属于o(4)，从而形成一种含高自旋类超平移的BMS型代数的阿贝尔扩展。
AI.motivation: 理解高阶张量场（特别是对偶引力子）在渐近边界上的对称性与守恒荷结构，拓展广义相对论中BMS代数和超平移概念至更高自旋情形。
AI.method: 在Bondi坐标下施加辐射衰减条件，采用类de Donder规范并结合壳上无迹条件；利用Noether 2-形式构造表面荷；在S^3上运用Hodge/Hodge-like分解将电荷分为标量、矢量和横迹三部分。
AI.result: 在D=5时，渐近电荷分解为标量Q_Φ（由标量函数Φ参数化）、矢量Q_V（由S^3上的微分同胚向量场V^i参数化）和TT电荷Q_{y^{TT}}（由S^3上横迹张量y_{ij}^{TT}参数化）；电荷代数仅在V_i属于o(4)时闭合，形成半直和结构o(4) ⋉ (C^∞(S³) ⊕ TT(S³))，即一种含高自旋类超平移的BMS型代数的阿贝尔扩展。
AI.conclusion: Curtright场在5维渐近边界上展现出比普通引力更丰富的对称结构，其电荷代数推广了BMS代数，引入了高自旋类超平移自由度，为高自旋引力和渐近对称性研究提供了新范例。

title: Unitary and finite self-energy of a single classical point charge and naked point singularity spacetimes
comment: 72 pages, 0 figures. Comments welcome. Submitted to Classical and Quantum Gravity
summary: We analyze linear Einstein--Maxwell perturbations of the superextremal Reissner--Nordström geometry in its static Kerr--Schild rest frame, viewing it as the nonlinear self-field of a single static point charge. In optical radial coordinates, and using the Kodama--Ishibashi gauge-invariant formalism, each radiative multipole is encoded by a single scalar master field on the half-line. The resulting master equation is of Regge--Wheeler type, with an inverse-square potential core at the optical apex (controlled by a Hardy inequality) and a short-range tail at infinity. The spatial-plus-potential part of the Einstein--Maxwell $T$-energy is closable and bounded below, which defines a positive quadratic form on the natural energy space. Its Friedrichs extension then gives the canonical self-adjoint realization of the master operator. The static Coulomb field and its nonlinear gravitational backreaction are treated as the exact background. All linear Einstein--Maxwell perturbations with finite spatial $T$-energy evolve unitarily on the energy space. The naked singularity at finite optical distance is ``silent'' in the technical sense that it carries no $T$-energy flux. We also construct the forward radiation field at future null infinity, obtaining a translation representation of the self-field dynamics in which the conserved $T$-energy coincides with the $L^2$ norm of the radiation profile in retarded time.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了超极端Reissner-Nordström几何中线性Einstein-Maxwell扰动，采用Kodama-Ishibashi规范不变形式，在光学径向坐标下将每个辐射多极子编码为半直线上一个标量主场，并证明其主方程具有Regge-Wheeler型结构；通过定义正定二次型和Friedrichs延拓，确立了主算子的自伴实现；结果表明所有有限T-能量的扰动在能量空间上幺正演化，裸奇点不携带T-能量流，并构建了未来零无穷远处的前向辐射场。
AI.motivation: 理解超极端带电黑洞（即裸奇点）背景下的线性引力-电磁扰动的稳定性与演化行为，尤其关注其能量结构、奇点的物理可及性及辐射特性。
AI.method: 采用静态Kerr-Schild坐标系与光学径向坐标，结合Kodama-Ishibashi规范不变形式，导出Regge-Wheeler型主方程；利用Hardy不等式控制奇点处势能行为；通过T-能量定义自然能量空间，构造其Friedrichs自伴延拓；并建立到未来零无穷远辐射场的翻译表示。
AI.result: 主方程具有良定义的自伴实现；所有有限T-能量扰动幺正演化；裸奇点在T-能量意义下‘静默’（无能量流）；成功构造前向辐射场，且T-能量等于辐射剖面在推迟时间上的L²范数。
AI.conclusion: 超极端Reissner-Nordström裸奇点背景下的线性Einstein-Maxwell扰动具有良好的数学适定性与物理一致性，其动力学可通过辐射场完全刻画，支持该几何作为经典非奇异自场模型的合理性。

title: Relative transverse activity as an event classifier to investigate collectivity-like phenomena in proton$-$proton collisions at the LHC energies
summary: Two-particle number ($R_{2}$) and transverse-momentum ($P_{2}$) correlation functions are studied in proton$-$proton collisions at $\sqrt{s}=13$ TeV simulated with PYTHIA 8, in the low-transverse-momentum region where soft QCD processes dominate the particle production. Events are classified using the relative transverse activity observable $R_{\mathrm{T}}$, which provides a differential characterization of predominantly soft underlying-event (UE) activity. A finite long-range near-side component emerges in the charge-independent correlator $R_{2}^{\mathrm{CI}}$ for UE-dominated events ($2.5 < R_{\mathrm{T}} \leq 5.0$), whereas no corresponding long-range structure is observed in the charge-dependent correlators. This behavior suggests that the ridge-like feature is primarily driven by charge-independent QCD dynamics rather than short-range charge-balancing effects. In contrast, the transverse-momentum correlator $P_{2}^{\mathrm{CI}}$ remains dominated by localized, jet-like structures across all $R_{\mathrm{T}}$ intervals. The near-side correlation peak exhibits a systematic narrowing in $Δ\varphi$ for the charge-independent case with increasing $R_{\mathrm{T}}$, while the charge-dependent correlators remain localized in both $Δη$ and $Δ\varphi$ and show only mild broadening. These results indicate that enhanced UE activity can give rise to collectivity-like long-range correlation structures within a non-hydrodynamic framework and provide a PYTHIA baseline for interpreting small-system measurements at the LHC.

AI.tldr: 本文利用PYTHIA 8模拟13 TeV质子-质子碰撞，通过相对横动量活动性观测量RT对事件分类，研究了双粒子数（R2）和横动量（P2）关联函数；发现UE主导事件中电荷无关R2^CI出现长程近侧结构（类喷注外的‘ridge’），而电荷相关关联无此结构，表明该结构源于电荷无关QCD动力学而非局域电荷守恒；P2^CI则始终以局域喷注结构为主；结果支持在非流体框架下、由增强的底层事件活动可产生类集体效应，并为LHC小系统实验提供PYTHIA基准。
AI.motivation: 理解小系统（如pp碰撞）中观测到的类集体长程关联（如'ridge'）是否源于强相互作用中的集体流（如夸克胶子等离子体QGP）或非流体机制（如底层事件UE）；需区分电荷依赖与电荷无关关联以厘清物理起源。
AI.method: 采用PYTHIA 8生成√s=13 TeV pp碰撞事件；引入相对横动量活动性RT作为事件分类变量，表征底层事件（UE）软过程主导程度；分别计算电荷无关R2^CI与电荷相关R2^CD、以及P2^CI关联函数，在Δη–Δφ空间分析其长程/短程结构、峰宽演化等特征。
AI.result: 在UE主导事件（2.5 < RT ≤ 5.0）中，R2^CI呈现显著长程近侧成分（|Δη| > 2），而R2^CD无此结构；P2^CI始终以局域喷注峰为主，且其近侧峰随RT增大在Δφ方向变窄；R2^CD和P2^CD则始终保持局域性并仅轻微展宽。
AI.conclusion: pp碰撞中观测到的长程‘ridge’类关联主要源自电荷无关的软QCD动力学（如多部分子散射或色玻璃凝聚CGC），而非短程电荷守恒效应；增强的UE活动可在非流体框架下诱导类集体关联；该PYTHIA结果为LHC小系统集体性解释提供了关键本底基准。

title: MEDUSA I. Tracing magnetic field structures in tidal arms of the dwarf-dwarf merger NGC 1487
summary: Dwarf galaxies are important laboratories for studying cosmic magnetism because they can maintain strong magnetic fields via the action of turbulent dynamo despite their low mass and weak gravitational potential. The Magnetic-field Evolution in Dwarf galaxies from Ultra-deep SKA Analysis (MEDUSA) survey is the first SKA-pathfinder programme designed to obtain deep continuum, polarisation, and HI data for dwarf galaxies, enabling a comprehensive study of their radio spectra, magnetic fields, and gas kinematics across a representative population. By analysing the radio continuum spectra and polarisation of the dwarf-dwarf galaxy merger NGC 1487 from the MEDUSA sample, we aim to determine its magnetic field strength and to characterise the large-scale and turbulent components of its magnetic field. We utilise highly sensitive multi-band radio continuum data from MeerKAT L-band (1.28 GHz) and Australia Telescope Compact Array (ATCA) L/S (2.1 GHz), C (5.5 GHz), and X-bands (9 GHz). We analysed the magnetic field configuration using polarisation and rotation measure (RM) synthesis. The integrated spectral energy distribution has a non-thermal spectral index of $α_{\rm nth} = -0.678\pm0.085$. Synchrotron and inverse Compton losses cause a spectral break at $ν_{\rm b} = 6.2\pm1.3$ GHz. In star-forming regions, the magnetic field exhibits strong small-scale fluctuations in RM, suggesting the action of a small-scale dynamo. Conversely, the field becomes more ordered, aligning with the tidal arms toward the galaxy's outskirts, showing a large-scale magnetic field over $\approx3$ kpc. Observations of the dwarf-dwarf merger NGC 1487 show that even low-mass galaxy mergers, likely the building blocks of larger galaxies in the early Universe, can rapidly amplify and produce coherent large-scale magnetic field structures, highlighting their key contribution in the early magnetisation of galaxies.

AI.tldr: 本文通过分析矮星系并合体NGC 1487的多频段射电连续谱与偏振数据，发现其存在由小尺度发电机驱动的强湍流磁场及延展达3 kpc的大尺度有序磁场，表明低质量星系并合可在早期宇宙中快速磁化星系。
AI.motivation: 矮星系是研究宇宙磁场的重要实验室，但其如何在低质量、弱引力势下维持强磁场尚不清楚；MEDUSA巡天旨在系统研究矮星系的磁场演化，尤其关注并合过程对磁场放大的作用。
AI.method: 利用MeerKAT和ATCA在L/S/C/X波段的高灵敏度射电连续谱与偏振数据，结合RM合成分析磁场结构，并拟合非热谱指数与谱断点以推断磁场强度与能量损失机制。
AI.result: NGC 1487的非热谱指数为α_nth = −0.678±0.085，谱断点在ν_b = 6.2±1.3 GHz；星暴区RM起伏强烈，显示小尺度发电机作用；外围潮汐臂处磁场有序排列，延伸约3 kpc，呈现大尺度相干结构。
AI.conclusion: 矮星系并合能快速放大并组织磁场，不仅产生强湍流成分，还能形成大尺度有序磁场，说明其在早期星系磁化过程中起关键作用。

title: Is Quadratic Gravity ghost free because the ghost is only virtual?
summary: In \cite{salvio} a prescription for calculating the correlation functions in Quadratic Gravity \cite{stelle1}-\cite{stelle2} was presented. This procedure does not enter in conflict with unitarity The Gauss-Ostrogradsky method for higher order theories defines two momentum densities $P_1$ and $P_2$ and two coordinate densities $Q_1$ and $Q_2$, one pair is standard, the other ghost like. The approach in \cite{salvio} involves the continuation $P_2\to i P_2$ and $Q_2\to i Q_2$ of the ghost variables. In the present work, following \cite{yomismo}, the LSZ rules are derived, but with a formalism adapted to full quartic or higher order theories. The hypothesis for quantization are that $[Q_1, Q_2]=\text{"gauge terms"}$, $[P_1, P_2]=\text{"gauge terms"}$ and $[P_1, Q_1]=iI+\text{"gauge terms"}$. This alone leads to the conclusion that $[P_2, Q_2]=-iI+\text{"gauge terms"}$, therefore this last pair of variables is ghost like. The graviton contains a massless mode, which is the standard graviton, plus two massive modes with masses $m_2$ and $m_3$. The third mode is usually interpreted as a ghost in the literature \cite{stelle2}. Here it is shown that, even after making the continuation $P_2\to i P_2$ and $Q_2\to i Q_2$, the creation and annihilation operators for this mode commute, the third mode does not appear as a free wave. This does not invalidate the model. The effective action $Γ$ can be calculated following \cite{stelle1}, and can be constrained by the Slavnov-Taylor identities \cite{Slavnov}-\cite{Taylor}, and the scattering rules may be worked out consequently.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了二次引力理论中的关联函数计算方法，通过调整鬼变量的解析延拓，证明了即使在进行虚数变换后，第三种模式（通常被视为鬼场）也不会作为自由波出现，从而不破坏模型的有效性。
AI.motivation: 解决二次引力理论中鬼场问题对量子化和单元性的潜在威胁，确保理论自洽。
AI.method: 采用高阶理论的高斯-奥斯特罗格拉茨基方法，引入两组动量与坐标密度，并对鬼变量进行虚数解析延拓；结合修正的LSZ规则与特定对易关系假设推导散射行为。
AI.result: 证明第三种 massive 模式在虚数变换后其产生/湮灭算符仍满足对易而非反对易关系，不表现为自由粒子态；有效作用量可通过 Slavnov-Taylor 恒等式约束。
AI.conclusion: 该处理方式避免了鬼场导致的幺正性破缺，支持二次引力作为可能的紫外完备引力候选理论。

title: The Role of Inhomogeneities in the Turbulent Accretion of Black Holes
summary: Observations of supermassive black holes by the Event Horizon Telescope reveal significant inhomogeneities, most likely related to density and magnetic field perturbations. To model these features, we conduct high-resolution 2D general-relativistic magnetohydrodynamics (GRMHD) simulations of a Fishbone-Moncrief torus around a Kerr black hole using the Black Hole Accretion Code $\texttt{BHAC}$. We compare unperturbed accretion with a case featuring plasma density bubbles with pressure balanced magnetic islands of different amplitudes. Power spectrum analysis of accretion time series, performed via the Blackman-Tukey method, shows that the perturbed case exhibits (1) steeper spectral indices compared to the unperturbed case, deviating from the characteristic $1/ω$ noise spectrum, and (2) increased correlation times, providing evidence for absorption of macro-structures at the event horizon. Spatial auto-correlation analysis of near-horizon turbulence confirms larger energy-containing coherent structures in the perturbed case altering the accretion rate. These results provide new insights for interpreting observations of supermassive black hole environments, where near-horizon turbulence may play a key role in the accretion process.

AI.tldr: 本文通过高分辨率2D广义相对论磁流体动力学（GRMHD）模拟，研究了Fishbone-Moncrief环在Kerr黑洞周围的吸积过程，重点分析密度气泡与磁岛扰动对吸积流时序和近视界湍流结构的影响；结果表明扰动导致功率谱指数变陡、相关时间增长，并证实宏观结构在事件视界处被吸收，揭示了近视界湍流在超大质量黑洞吸积中的关键作用。
AI.motivation: 解释事件视界望远镜（EHT）观测到的超大质量黑洞图像中显著不均匀性（可能源于密度和磁场扰动），需建立能反映真实物理扰动的吸积流模型。
AI.method: 采用Black Hole Accretion Code（BHAC）进行高分辨率2D广义相对论磁流体动力学（GRMHD）模拟，对比无扰动吸积与含压强平衡磁岛型密度气泡扰动的两种情形；利用Blackman-Tukey方法进行吸积时间序列功率谱分析，并开展近视界湍流的空间自相关分析。
AI.result: 扰动情形下：(1) 功率谱指数更陡，偏离典型1/ω噪声谱；(2) 相关时间增加，表明宏观结构被事件视界吸收；(3) 近视界湍流中能量主导的相干结构更大，显著改变吸积率。
AI.conclusion: 近视界湍流及其受扰动调制的宏观结构对吸积过程具有关键影响，为解释EHT等观测中黑洞阴影周围的不均匀性提供了新的理论依据。

title: Directional recoil detection for CEvNS measurements with light nuclei at the Spallation Neutron Source
summary: The coherent elastic scattering of neutrinos on nuclei, also known as CEvNS, has been studied for several years by the COHERENT program of experiments using neutrinos from stopped-pion decays produced at the Spallation Neutron Source (SNS). We propose a new approach for CEvNS measurements at the SNS that aims to complement the COHERENT experiments in two main ways: by reconstructing the angular distribution of CEvNS-induced recoils, and by measuring CEvNS on much lighter target nuclei such as helium, carbon, and fluorine. The proposed detector would employ a gaseous time-projection chamber with a highly segmented charge readout to enable the spatial reconstruction of $\sim$10-500 keV ionisation tracks created by CEvNS-induced recoils. This would enable the simultaneous measurement of the CEvNS recoil energy and scattering angle, thereby allowing event-by-event reconstruction of the neutrino energy. We estimate that a 60:40 He:CF$_4$ gas mixture at atmospheric pressure offers a good trade-off between total target mass and good directionality and could deliver a detection of the angular distribution of CEvNS, even under pessimistic background conditions. We project the sensitivity of 1 and 10 m$^3$-scale detectors in the context of several physics cases, including: the measurement of the Standard Model CEvNS cross section, reconstruction of the flavour-dependent neutrino fluxes, observing the neutrino-induced Migdal effect, constraints on beyond-Standard Model neutrino interactions, and probing 10-eV-scale sterile neutrinos.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于气体时间投影室的新探测器方案，用于在SNS上测量相干弹性中微子-原子核散射（CEvNS），重点实现反冲核角分布重建和轻核（He、C、F）靶上的CEvNS测量。
AI.motivation: 弥补COHERENT实验的不足，通过重建CEvNS反冲核角分布和拓展至更轻靶核，提升中微子能量重建能力及新物理探针灵敏度。
AI.method: 采用高分段电荷读出的气体时间投影室，利用60:40 He:CF₄混合气体，在大气压下探测10–500 keV电离径迹，实现反冲能量与散射角的逐事件测量。
AI.result: 该方案可在悲观本底条件下实现CEvNS角分布的首次测量，并对标准模型截面、味依赖中微子通量、Migdal效应、超出标准模型相互作用及10-eV量级惰性中微子提供显著灵敏度。
AI.conclusion: 所提气体TPC方案为CEvNS研究开辟了新维度，兼具方向性与轻核靶优势，有望成为COHERENT后续实验的重要补充。

title: Searching for and characterizing halo substructures with the GALAH DR4 survey
summary: Recent studies show that the Milky Way stellar halo is composed of populations of different origins, shaped by multiple accretion events. To better understand the formation of the Milky Way and other spiral galaxies, we characterize the chemical and kinematic properties of halo substructures using GALAH DR4 and Gaia data. We apply wavelet transforms in the space of sqrt(J_r) and azimuthal action (L_z) to identify kinematic overdensities. Stars in the detected structures are analyzed in elemental abundance space to determine their origin. We further assess contamination using the unsupervised machine-learning algorithm t-distributed stochastic neighbor embedding (t-SNE), performing chemical tagging with 15 elemental abundances. We recover five structures: the Galactic disk, the Splash, Gaia-Sausage-Enceladus (GSE), Thamnos1, and Thamnos2. GSE shows two peaks; one at sqrt(J_r) ~ 25 kpc km s^-1 is due to disk contamination, while the other above sqrt(J_r) ~ 40 kpc km s^-1 represents the cleanest GSE population. Thamnos exhibits three peaks linked to Thamnos1 and Thamnos2. Thamnos2 shows higher [alpha/Fe], iron-peak elements are enhanced in the Splash, and halo groups retain a stronger r-process signature. The multiply peaked structures suggest that the splashed disk extends beyond prograde orbits. The distinct chemo-dynamical properties of the halo groups support their extragalactic origin.

AI.method: 在sqrt(J_r)–L_z空间应用小波变换识别运动学过密区；结合15种元素丰度，使用t-SNE进行无监督化学分类与污染评估。

title: When spacetime vibrates: An introduction to gravitational waves
comment: Invited contribution to the special edition of the Portuguese Physical Society's Gazeta de Física dedicated to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the first detection of gravitational waves. 42 pages, 18 figures
summary: This article presents a comprehensive analysis of the physics of gravitational waves, exploring both the theoretical foundations and the most recent experimental advances. After a general introduction to the theory of general relativity and its major implications, the article discusses the history of gravitational waves, from their prediction by Einstein to their actual detection. It then explains what gravitational waves are and how they interact with appropriate detectors. The main mechanisms of gravitational radiation emission are analyzed, with a focus on compact binary systems of compact objects, whose orbits typically evolve in three phases: inspiral, merger, and the final ringdown phase, each of these phases leaving distinct signatures in the emitted waves. The article highlights the fundamental role of the giant interferometers LIGO, Virgo, and KAGRA, true cathedrals of modern science, and revisits the historic event GW150914, the first direct detection of gravitational waves, which confirmed the predictions of general relativity and opened a new era for astronomy. This achievement was recognized with the 2017 Nobel Prize in Physics. Other observed events are also discussed, along with their astrophysical sources, and the possibility of detecting gravitational waves of cosmological origin, originating from the Big Bang itself. Finally, current and future projects are analyzed, including observatories based on increasingly sophisticated interferometers, as well as proposals for alternative detection methods, illustrating how gravitational-wave astronomy is shaping the present and future of our exploration of the universe. In concluding, the detection of gravitational waves is set in a broader context by examining the discoveries across the electromagnetic spectrum, thereby illustrating the complementary perspectives these different observational channels provide.

AI.tldr: 本文全面分析了引力波的物理原理，涵盖广义相对论理论基础与最新实验进展，重点介绍LIGO、Virgo、KAGRA等干涉仪探测器及首次直接探测事件GW150914，并展望了未来引力波天文学的发展。

AI.method: 综述性分析，结合理论推导与实验观测，聚焦于激光干涉仪探测技术及致密双星系统引力辐射建模。

title: A New Perspective on the Cosmological Constant and Its Core Problems
summary: One of the most enduring and unresolved challenges in modern theoretical and observational cosmology is the fine-tuning and coincidence problems associated with the cosmological constant. Rather than attempting to reconcile these issues within the standard LCDM framework where they remain effectively frozen, we adopt a fundamentally different viewpoint based on alternative theories of gravity. We argue that the root of these problems lies in a deep misinterpretation of the cosmological constant, particularly its identification with the quantum ground-state energy of spacetime. In this work, we propose a novel physical interpretation of the cosmological constant and introduce a new mechanism, termed Breaking Energy-Momentum Symmetry. This framework provides a natural and unified route toward alleviating, and potentially resolving, both the fine-tuning and coincidence problems, offering a compelling alternative to the conventional cosmological paradigm.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于替代理论引力的新框架，通过重新解释宇宙学常数并引入‘能量-动量对称性破缺’机制，旨在自然地缓解乃至解决宇宙学常数的精细调节与巧合问题。
AI.motivation: 解决标准ΛCDM模型中宇宙学常数所面临的长期未解的精细调节问题和巧合问题，认为其根源在于将宇宙学常数错误地等同于时空量子基态能量。
AI.method: 采用替代引力理论视角，提出宇宙学常数的新物理诠释，并构建‘能量-动量对称性破缺’新机制。
AI.result: 该框架为缓解甚至解决精细调节与巧合问题提供了自然且统一的路径。
AI.conclusion: 宇宙学常数问题并非源于观测或计算误差，而是现有理论诠释的根本缺陷；新机制为超越标准宇宙学范式提供了有力候选方案。

title: 2025 EIC-France Workshop: Physics Highlights and Perspectives
comment: 10 pages, excluding the title page, author list, acknowledgements, and references; 6 figures
summary:
This document presents a synthesis of the theory contributions and discussions from the 2nd EIC-France Workshop, held at IJCLab (Orsay) on 1-3 December 2025. The workshop brought together members of the French hadron-physics community to review recent theoretical developments relevant to the future Electron-Ion Collider (EIC) and to coordinate national efforts in preparation for its early physics program. The report first summarizes the collider's initial running conditions and luminosity performance, as outlined in the EIC Early Science Matrix. It then provides concise overviews of the theoretical presentations on inclusive, semi-inclusive, exclusive, heavy-flavor, and small-x physics.
  Based on these discussions, two measurements emerged as especially well suited for early EIC operation and strongly aligned with areas of established French expertise: inclusive diffraction and inclusive quarkonium production. These channels offer clean signatures, robust theoretical interpretability, and direct sensitivity to fundamental QCD phenomena such as gluon saturation, heavy-quark dynamics, and the small-x structure of hadrons and nuclei.
  In addition, the workshop identified longer-term physics opportunities that will benefit from the full capabilities of the EIC after its ramp-up phase. These include accessing the three-dimensional structure of the pion through the Sullivan process and a broader program of exclusive three-body final states, both of which represent high-impact avenues for exploring hadronic structure and non-perturbative QCD. Together, the elements summarized in this report provide a coherent overview of the strategic priorities and scientific ambitions shaping the French community's contribution to the EIC physics program.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了第二届EIC-France研讨会的理论成果与讨论，聚焦于法国强子物理界为未来电子-离子对撞机（EIC）早期物理计划所做的理论准备，重点推荐了符合法国专长的两个早期测量方向：包容性衍射和包容性夸克偶素产生，并展望了EIC全面运行后的三维强子结构等长期物理课题。

title: Chemodynamical properties of gas-rich galaxies: a comparison of observations and simulations
summary: We perform a comprehensive analysis of the chemical and dynamical properties of quasar-damped Lyman-α (DLA) galaxies and compare these to the GEAR chemodynamical simulations. Specifically, we aim to constrain the behavior of α-element enhancements with metallicity, the dependence of [α/Fe] on the specific star formation rate (sSFR), and the absorption-line velocity widths (Δv90) vs. stellar mass, Δv90 vs. metallicity, and mass-metallicity relations. For the comparison, we select five galaxies simulated with the chemodynamical Tree-SPH code GEAR with stellar masses in the range of log(M*/Msol) between 6.1 and 10.8, and at six different redshifts between 0.33 and 4.12. We find that the abundance ratios [α/Fe] and [M/H] observed in the interstellar medium (ISM) of DLA galaxies overlap with the abundance trends in gas of the simulated galaxies. Our findings corroborate a picture in which DLAs with Δv90 below and above 100 km/s trace galaxies with masses in the ranges of log M* 6 - 8 and 8 - 11 solar masses, respectively. We suggest that observations should be used with caution when constraining the theoretical [α/Fe] vs. sSFR relations because of systematics (if abundances are obtained from emission lines) or differences in the gas properties as probed by a DLA and its counterpart. So far, only the observations in absorption of inner gas of the LMC and SMC are in agreement with the simulated data. We confirm that DLAs detected at large impact parameters most likely probe the gas of satellite or other halo galaxies which are adjacent to the central galaxy. We further find that the velocity widths vs. stellar masses and mass-metallicity relations agree well with observations, while GEAR should be calibrated more carefully to reproduce the Δv90 vs. metallicity relation.

AI.tldr: 本文通过将类星体阻尼莱曼-α（DLA）星系的化学与动力学观测性质与GEAR化学动力学模拟结果进行系统比较，约束了α元素丰度比[α/Fe]随金属丰度、比恒星形成率（sSFR）的变化关系，以及吸收线速度宽度Δv90与恒星质量、金属丰度和质量-金属丰度关系的对应行为。结果表明DLA观测与模拟在多数趋势上一致，但在Δv90–金属丰度关系上需改进模拟校准，并强调吸收与发射线观测间存在系统性差异。
AI.motivation: 旨在利用DLA观测约束星系化学演化模型的关键参数，特别是[α/Fe]–金属丰度、[α/Fe]–sSFR关系及动力学指标（如Δv90）与恒星质量/金属丰度的关系，以检验GEAR模拟对高红移星系物理的刻画能力。
AI.method: 将观测到的DLA星系的化学（[α/Fe]、[M/H]）与动力学（Δv90）性质，与GEAR Tree-SPH化学动力学模拟中5个星系（恒星质量log(M*/Msol)=6.1–10.8，红移z=0.33–4.12）的气体成分和运动学进行多维度对比分析。
AI.result: DLA的[α/Fe]和[M/H]与模拟气体趋势重叠；Δv90 < 100 km/s 和 > 100 km/s 的DLA分别对应模拟中log M* ≈ 6–8 和 8–11 的星系；Δv90–质量、质量–金属丰度关系与观测吻合良好；但Δv90–金属丰度关系需GEAR进一步校准；LMC/SMC内区吸收观测与模拟最一致；大撞击参数DLA很可能探测伴星系或晕内气体。
AI.conclusion: DLA是研究星系化学与动力学演化的重要探针，但需谨慎解读[α/Fe]–sSFR关系（受观测方法与气体区域差异影响）；GEAR模拟整体合理，但在Δv90–金属丰度关系建模上尚需优化；大撞击参数DLA主要反映卫星或晕气体而非主星系盘。

title: Chaotic imprints of dark matter in extreme mass-ratio inspirals
summary: Extreme mass-ratio inspirals (EMRIs) are among the most powerful probes of strong-field gravity and of the environments surrounding supermassive compact objects. Motivated by the expected presence of dark matter near galactic centers, we investigate the emergence and gravitational-wave imprints of chaotic dynamics in EMRIs evolving in non-vacuum spacetimes. Within a unified dynamical framework, we analyze test-particle motion in a broad class of dark-matter-embedded geometries, including singular black holes, regular black holes, naked singularities, and Einstein-cluster configurations. We show that environmental perturbations generically break integrability in the strong-field regime, giving rise to chaotic motion whose onset, duration, and termination depend sensitively on horizon structure, core regularization, and matter distribution. Using the numerical Kludge approach, we demonstrate that chaotic trajectories produce systematic qualitative modifications of the emitted gravitational radiation, such as irregular amplitude modulation and loss of phase coherence, in contrast to the smooth, quasi-periodic waveforms generated by regular motion. Our results establish the robustness of chaos in environmentally perturbed EMRIs and provide a clear conceptual link between nonlinear orbital dynamics, spacetime structure, and observable gravitational-wave signatures.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了极端质量比旋进（EMRIs）在非真空时空（如暗物质环境）中的混沌动力学及其引力波印记，发现环境扰动会普遍破坏强场区的可积性，导致混沌运动，并显著改变引力波波形特征。
AI.motivation: 受银河系中心可能存在暗物质的启发，探究暗物质等环境因素对EMRI轨道动力学及引力波信号的影响。
AI.method: 在统一动力学框架下，分析测试粒子在多种暗物质嵌入时空（包括奇异黑洞、正则黑洞、裸奇点和爱因斯坦团簇）中的运动；采用数值Kludge方法模拟混沌轨道及其引力波辐射。
AI.result: 环境扰动在强场区普遍破坏可积性，引发混沌运动，其出现、持续与终止敏感依赖于视界结构、核心正则化和物质分布；混沌轨迹导致引力波出现不规则幅度调制和相位相干性丧失。
AI.conclusion: 混沌在环境扰动的EMRIs中具有鲁棒性，且非线性轨道动力学、时空结构与可观测引力波信号之间存在清晰的概念联系。

title: Gauss-Bonnet Gravity and Spacetime Singularities
summary: We investigate the effect of higher-order curvature terms, specifically Gauss-Bonnet terms, on spacetime singularities in five dimensions. For FLRW cosmologies, we demonstrate that Gauss-Bonnet terms can replace the Big Bang/Crunch with a "sudden" singularity, characterized by a finite scale factor and Hubble rate but diverging higher-order derivatives. Investigating various branches of solutions shows the possibility of explicit extension of non-spacelike geodesics beyond the singular point. Furthermore, we employ the Gauss-Bonnet junction conditions to verify the consistency of the extension with the field equations. The whole solution describes a contracting phase prior to the expansion phase with a well-defined surface stress-energy tensor. Regarding the Boulware-Deser black hole, we find that Gauss-Bonnet terms soften the central singularity for radial geodesics--rendering them "weak" according to the Tipler and Krolak criteria--whereas non-radial geodesics remain strongly singular. Junction condition analysis of this solution shows that although higher-curvature corrections alter the nature of the singularity, geodesics are still inextendible as a result of divergent extrinsic curvature. Our results are consistent with the Penrose-Hawking singularity theorems since in Gauss-Bonnet black holes, geodesics suffer from focusing (expansion parameter diverges), while in cosmology, there is no focusing since the expansion parameter remains finite at the singularity.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了五维时空中的高阶曲率项（特别是Gauss-Bonnet项）对时空奇点的影响：在FLRW宇宙学中，它可将大爆炸/大挤压奇点替换为‘突变’奇点，并允许类时/类光测地线显式延拓；而在Boulware-Deser黑洞中，它仅软化径向测地线的中心奇点，非径向测地线仍强奇异；整体结果与Penrose-Hawking奇点定理一致。
AI.motivation: 探究高阶曲率修正（如Gauss-Bonnet项）是否能缓解或消除广义相对论中的时空奇点，特别是在五维引力理论中。
AI.method: 分析五维FLRW宇宙学与Boulware-Deser黑洞解中Gauss-Bonnet项的影响；计算测地线行为、奇点强度（Tipler/Krolak判据）；应用Gauss-Bonnet拼接条件验证解的自洽性与延拓可能性。
AI.result: 1) FLRW模型中出现‘突变’奇点，尺度因子和哈勃参量有限，但高阶导数发散；非类空测地线可显式延拓，且拼接条件支持带物理表面能动张量的收缩-膨胀相变；2) 黑洞中径向测地线奇点变弱，非径向仍强奇异；拼接分析表明外曲率发散导致测地线不可延拓。
AI.conclusion: Gauss-Bonnet项可改变奇点性质（如类型与强度），但不违背Penrose-Hawking定理：宇宙学中无测地线聚焦（膨胀参数有限），黑洞中仍存在聚焦（膨胀参数发散）。

title: Thermodynamically consistent treatment of repulsive corrections in HRG
summary: We reformulate the treatment of density-dependent chemical potential shifts appearing in excluded-volume implementations of the hadron resonance gas model. An auxiliary classical representation is constructed in which a common energy shift is determined by preserving the scalar number density, ensuring thermodynamic consistency. Hadron radii are parametrized through a liquid-drop inspired mass-radius relation with two parameters: the pion radius and a scaling exponent. The resulting framework reproduces lattice QCD results for lower-order conserved-charge susceptibilities at zero chemical potentials with only two adjustable parameters.
