AI.motivation: 改进排除体积法在强子共振气体模型中对密度依赖化学势偏移的处理，提升其与格点QCD结果的一致性及热力学自洽性。
AI.method: 构建辅助经典表示，以保持标量数密度确定共同能量偏移；采用液滴模型启发的质量-半径关系参数化强子半径（含两个参数：π介子半径和标度指数）。
AI.result: 仅用两个可调参数即成功复现格点QCD在零化学势下给出的低阶守恒荷（如重子数、电荷、奇异数）敏感度结果。
AI.conclusion: 该新框架在保持热力学一致性的同时显著提升了模型对格点QCD数据的描述能力，凸显了强子半径参数化方案的有效性与简洁性。

title: MIGHTEE: Discovery of a triple-double radio galaxy
comment: 16 pages + appendix materials (4 pages), Accepted for publication in MNRAS
summary: Triple-double radio galaxies (TDRGs) are amongst the rarest subpopulations of radio galaxies (RGs). They are characterised by three pairs of radio lobes, where each pair of lobes represents an episode of nuclear activity. Such a feature makes them key objects that can be used to constrain the duty cycle of RGs. In this paper, we report the discovery of J022248\m060934, a new TDRG, hosted by a galaxy at a spectroscopic redshift of $z \approx$ 0.94. We have used the MIGHTEE-DR1 data set and MIGHTEE sub-band images as our main data. In total intensity, J022248\m060934 has a bright core and triple-double, edge-brightened-like peaks of radio emission. The polarimetry of the source reveals an inhomogeneous density of the hosting environment which is consistent with the more pronounced bending in its eastern lobes. The spectral index and curvature maps suggest an inverted core and an ultra-steepening of the spectrum towards the outer lobes which reinforce a recurrent nuclear activity. We perform individual spectral age fitting of the components of the source using the JP model and we found a lower limit total age of $\sim$16 Myr. We also derive a short inactive period between the active phases and a rapid duty cycle of 90 per cent for the first cycle of activity. Our spectral ageing analysis suggests that the triple-double structure in TDRGs is not the product of long quiescent periods, as deduced by previous works based on kinematic ages.

AI.tldr: 本文报告了新发现的三重双射电星系J022248−060934，利用MIGHTEE-DR1数据对其射电结构、偏振、谱指数及曲率进行分析，通过JP模型谱龄拟合得出其总年龄下限约16 Myr，活动占空比高达90%，表明TDRGs的三重双结构并非源于长期静默期。
AI.motivation: 三重双射电星系（TDRGs）极为稀有，其三对射电瓣对应三次核活动事件，是研究射电星系活动周期（duty cycle）的关键对象；此前基于运动学年龄的研究推测存在长静默期，亟需谱龄分析验证。
AI.method: 基于MIGHTEE-DR1总强度与子波段图像，结合偏振、谱指数和谱曲率图分析；采用JP模型对各射电成分分别进行谱龄拟合，并推导活动间隔与占空比。
AI.result: 发现新TDRG J022248−060934（z≈0.94），具亮核与边缘增亮的三重双结构；偏振显示宿主环境密度不均；谱指数图显示核呈倒置谱、外瓣谱陡化；谱龄拟合得总年龄下限~16 Myr，首期活动占空比达90%，静默期极短。
AI.conclusion: TDRGs的三重双结构并非源于长期静默，而是高频次、高占空比核活动的结果，挑战了以往基于运动学年龄的长静默期假说；该结果为射电星系活动周期模型提供了关键观测约束。

title: Propagation effects of Lorentz violation in gravitational waves
summary: We investigate the propagation of gravitational waves in the presence of Lorentz- and diffeomorphism-violating operators within the linearized gravitational sector of the Standard Model Extension. Focusing on isotropic contributions, we analyze the combined effects of the nondispersive CPT-even dimension-four coefficient $\mathring{k}^{(4)}_{(I)}$ and the CPT-odd dimension-five coefficient $\mathring{k}^{(5)}_{(V)}$ on tensorial gravitational radiation. The modified dispersion relation induces both a rescaling of the propagation speed and helicity-dependent dispersive corrections, leading to birefringence and polarization mixing without introducing additional propagating degrees of freedom. We derive the retarded Green function associated with the modified wave operator and obtain explicit expressions for the gravitational waveform generated by matter sources. As a concrete application, we examine a binary black hole system and show how Lorentz violation alters the observed strain through shifted retarded times, amplitude rescaling, and higher derivative corrections to the quadrupole formula. The CPT-odd term produces characteristic attenuation and distortions in the waveform, which can be interpreted as energy exchange between the gravitational wave and the Lorentz-violating background rather than a violation of energy conservation. Using published LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA propagation tests and polarization consistency arguments, we translate current observational constraints into bounds on $\mathring{k}^{(4)}_{(I)}$ and $\mathring{k}^{(5)}_{(V)}$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了标准模型扩展中洛伦兹和微分同胚破缺算符对引力波传播的影响，重点分析了各向同性情况下CPT偶数维度四系数和CPT奇数维度五系数的联合效应，推导了修正的色散关系、格林函数及引力波形，并利用LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA观测数据给出了相关系数的约束界限。
AI.motivation: 探索引力波在洛伦兹和微分同胚破缺背景下的传播特性，以检验基础物理对称性并为新物理提供观测探针。
AI.method: 基于标准模型扩展的线性化引力扇区，分析各向同性洛伦兹破缺系数对引力波色散关系、极化态及波形的影响；推导修正波动算符的推迟格林函数；计算物质源产生的引力波形；结合双黑洞系统建模与LIGO-Virgo-KAGRA观测约束进行参数定界。
AI.result: 发现洛伦兹破缺导致传播速度重标度、手性依赖的色散、双折射和偏振混合；CPT奇数项引起波形衰减与畸变，对应于引力波与背景的能量交换；获得对系数 $\mathring{k}^{(4)}_{(I)}$ 和 $\mathring{k}^{(5)}_{(V)}$ 的当前最强观测约束。
AI.conclusion: 引力波是探测洛伦兹破缺的高灵敏探针；所分析的破缺项不引入额外自由度，但显著改变波形结构；观测约束为量子引力模型提供了重要限制。

title: MoCaNLO: a Monte Carlo integrator for NLO calculations
summary: We present the Monte Carlo integration code MoCaNLO, which computes cross sections and distributions for processes at high-energy colliders like the LHC at leading and next-to-leading order (NLO) in the strong and electroweak couplings. It relies on the Recola package for the calculation of matrix elements and uses Catani-Seymour dipole subtraction for the treatment of infrared singularities. It has been used for several cutting-edge calculations of NLO QCD and electroweak corrections over the last years, such as NLO QCD corrections to off-shell top-antitop-quark production in association with a pair of bottom quarks and NLO electroweak corrections to vector-boson scattering processes.

AI.tldr: MoCaNLO是一个用于高能对撞机（如LHC）过程的蒙特卡洛积分代码，支持强耦合和电弱耦合的领头阶（LO）和下一阶（NLO）截面与分布计算，基于Recola计算矩阵元，并采用Catani-Seymour偶极子减除法处理红外奇异性。
AI.motivation: 为高能对撞机物理提供高效、精确的LO/NLO精度计算工具，尤其针对复杂多粒子末态和混合QCD-电弱修正的需求。
AI.method: 基于蒙特卡洛积分，结合Recola计算矩阵元，采用Catani-Seymour偶极子减除法处理实辐射中的红外发散。
AI.result: 成功应用于多个前沿NLO计算，包括离壳tt̄+bb̄过程的QCD修正和矢量玻色子散射的电弱修正。
AI.conclusion: MoCaNLO是一个可靠、通用的NLO计算框架，已在多个重要物理过程中验证其有效性与精度。

title: The morphological stability of open clusters: a new 2D perspective
comment: 17 pages, 23 figures, 5 tables, accepted for publication in A&A
summary: Open clusters (OCs) usually evolve gradually as the number of their members changes, which can be manifested in their morphological characteristics. We aim to investigate the morphological stability of 1,490 OCs and further explore the potential change of morphological stability of the OCs at different spatial positions, using the OC catalog from the literature. We define for the first time a new morphological stability parameter Ncore/Nouter, a ratio of member numbers between cluster core and outer areas within tidal radii, which has a significant positive correlation against N, with a slope of 1.140\pm0.039, significantly steeper than the 0.720\pm0.026 measured for Score/Souter. This demonstrates that the stellar density in the core is a more sensitive tracer for morphological stability than geometry. Spatially, the radial sample OCs have larger slopes of Ncore/Nouter and Score/Souter against N, with 1.083\pm0.116 and 0.733\pm0.080, respectively, whereas those in the tangential direction 1.013\pm0.110 and 0.529\pm0.075, respectively, which means that the impact on sample OCs from tidal forces directed toward the Galactic center is possibly stronger than that from the shear force caused by the differential rotation of the Galactic disk. Besides, the sample OCs younger than 30 Myr display a shallow slope of 0.751\pm0.166, with those older than 800 Myr (1.442\pm0.128), reflecting that young OCs likely endure both internal disruptions, such as early dynamical heating weakening core binding and more severe external disturbances, compared to older OCs.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的星团形态稳定性参数Ncore/Nouter，发现其与星团成员数N呈显著正相关，且核心恒星密度比几何参数更能反映形态稳定性；空间分析表明朝向银心的潮汐力影响强于盘面剪切力，年轻星团（<30 Myr）受内外扰动更强，而年老星团（>800 Myr）更稳定。
AI.motivation: 探究1490个疏散星团（OCs）的形态稳定性及其在不同空间位置上的变化规律，理解星团演化过程中内外扰动的影响机制。
AI.method: 基于文献星团编目，首次定义形态稳定性参数Ncore/Nouter（核心与外围成员数之比），并对比几何参数Score/Souter；通过线性拟合分析其与总成员数N的关系，并按空间方位（径向/切向）和年龄分组进行统计分析。
AI.result: Ncore/Nouter与N的斜率为1.140±0.039，显著陡于Score/Souter的0.720±0.026；径向样本斜率更大，表明银心潮汐力主导；年轻星团斜率小（0.751±0.166），年老星团斜率大（1.442±0.128）。
AI.conclusion: 核心恒星密度是比几何形状更灵敏的形态稳定性示踪量；星团形态演化受银河系潮汐力和内部动力学加热共同调控，且随年龄增长趋于稳定。

title: Leptophilic scalar dark matter in U(1)$_{L_μ-L_τ}$: Evading direct detection and prospective neutron star heating
summary: Leptophilic dark matter (DM) is a well-motivated thermal WIMP framework that can evade stringent nuclear-recoil searches while remaining testable via DM-induced heating of neutron stars (NS). In this work, we study leptophilic scalar DM in a $\mathrm{U(1)}_{L_μ-L_τ}$ gauge extension of the Standard Model, which provides a common leptophilic portal for all scenarios considered. To reproduce the observed relic abundance while suppressing direct-detection signals, we investigate three benchmark realizations: (i) a secluded DM scenario in which the relic density is set by annihilation into $\mathrm{U(1)}_{L_μ-L_τ}$ gauge bosons, and two pseudo-Nambu-Goldstone boson (pNGB) DM models based on (ii) an SO(4) symmetry and (iii) an SO(3) symmetry. In the SO(4) pNGB model, the DM mass arises at tree level from a soft breaking term, while the elastic scattering amplitude is suppressed by a symmetry-protected cancellation. In the SO(3) pNGB model, the DM mass is generated radiatively at one loop via the $\mathrm{U(1)}_{L_μ-L_τ}$ gauge interaction, and we show that this gauging preserves the same cancellation mechanism, maintaining compatibility with direct-detection null results. We perform a systematic parameter scan imposing relic density, direct- and indirect-detection, and neutrino trident constraints, and identify viable sub-TeV to TeV DM candidates. Assuming maximal capture in NSs, we find that the remaining parameter space can be tested by near-infrared observations of NSs, providing sensitivity complementary to terrestrial searches in regions that are currently weakly constrained.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了基于U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ}规范扩展的轻子亲和型标量暗物质模型，提出三种基准实现（隐匿型、SO(4)与SO(3)对称性下的赝Nambu-Goldstone玻色子DM），在满足遗迹丰度、直接/间接探测及中微子三叉戟等约束下，识别出亚TeV至TeV质量范围内的可行暗物质候选者，并指出中子星红外观测可对其剩余参数空间提供互补探测灵敏度。
AI.motivation: 规避核反冲实验的强限制，同时保持通过中子星加热效应进行可观测性；利用轻子亲和机制自然避开传统直接探测通道。
AI.method: 构建U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ}规范扩展下的三种轻子亲和标量暗物质模型（隐匿型、SO(4) pNGB、SO(3) pNGB），系统扫描参数空间，施加遗迹丰度、直接/间接探测、中微子三叉戟等实验约束。
AI.result: 确认亚TeV至TeV质量范围内存在满足所有当前实验约束的暗物质参数空间；该剩余区域可通过中子星近红外热辐射观测进行探测，形成对地面实验的互补灵敏度。
AI.conclusion: 轻子亲和型标量暗物质在U(1)_{L_μ-L_τ}框架下具有理论自洽性和可观测性，中子星热观测是检验其关键参数空间的有效新途径。

title: The early history of symmetric teleparallel gravity: An overlooked period
summary: It is noteworthy that symmetric teleparallel gravity has attracted considerable attention in recent years. A survey of the literature indicates that this surge of interest became particularly prominent around 2017 and 2018. However, together with my students and collaborators, we published a series of systematic and pioneering papers on this subject between 2004 and 2013. In this letter, we will summarize our overlooked contributions to symmetric teleparallel gravity produced during that period. For the sake of completeness and coherence, we will also briefly review our work on this topic carried out after 2018. In the final paragraph, we will write our personal perspectives on the future of symmetric teleparallel geometry.

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了作者及其团队在对称遥平行引力（symmetric teleparallel gravity）领域从2004至2013年的开创性工作，并简述2018年后相关研究，最后提出对该几何未来发展的个人见解。
AI.motivation: 纠正学术界对对称遥平行引力研究起源的认知偏差，强调作者团队早在2004–2013年就已开展系统性、奠基性工作，而近年（2017–2018起）的广泛关注却未充分承认这些早期贡献。
AI.method: 以文献综述与自我陈述相结合的方式，梳理并总结团队在2004–2013年间发表的一系列原创性论文，补充2018年后的工作进展，并辅以个人观点阐述。
AI.result: 明确了作者团队在对称遥平行引力理论发展初期的关键角色，厘清了该方向的研究时间线与核心贡献脉络。
AI.conclusion: 作者团队的工作是该领域真正的先驱性探索；呼吁学界更公正地认可早期系统性研究，并对未来基于对称遥平行几何的引力理论发展提出展望。

title: Probing the Milky Way Halo with RR Lyrae Stars from Gaia Data Release 3
comment: 16 pages, 11 figures, accepted for publication in A&A
summary: The Milky Way (MW) stellar halo, containing debris from past accretion events, serves as a fossil record of hierarchical mass assembly. Due to their distinct properties, RR Lyrae stars (RRLs) serve as excellent tracers for identifying and characterising the halo's substructures. We analysed a sample of 4933 RRLs, for which we calculated the integrals of motion and orbital parameters. We applied the domain-informed novelty detection CLustering in Multiphase Boundaries (CLiMB) framework to identify RRL membership in the MW substructures. We analysed the metallicity distributions of RRLs in major accreted system remnants as a snapshot of their chemical evolutionary status during early epochs. We calculated the weighted mean metallicity ([Fe/H]) and the corresponding standard deviation for Gaia Sausage/Enceladus ([Fe/H] = $-1.57 \pm 0.25$ dex), Sequoia ([Fe/H] =$ -1.64\pm0.26$ dex), and the Helmi streams ([Fe/H] = $-1.66\pm0.19$ dex). The metallicity distribution of RRLs in Thamnos was found to be bimodal, with the metal-poor peak likely representing the genuine accreted Thamnos population ([Fe/H] = $-1.94\pm0.20$ dex), in agreement with recent works based on spectroscopic abundances. Our analysis shows that the substructures ED-1 and L-RL3 are highly contaminated by thick disc stars. However, the metal-poor tails in their metallicity distributions may be signatures of remnants from small accreted systems. We also identify over-densities of RRLs in correspondence with the recently reported substructures Shiva and Shakti, which we suggest are of in-situ origin. Finally, we applied the RRL-based mass-metallicity relation of galaxies to test the nature of the identified dynamical substructures.

AI.tldr: 本文利用4933颗RR Lyrae恒星的运动学和金属丰度数据，结合CLiMB方法识别银河系恒星晕中的吸积遗迹，并分析其化学演化特征，发现多个子结构的金属丰度分布及其可能起源。
AI.motivation: 银河系恒星晕是研究等级式质量并合历史的“化石记录”，而RR Lyrae恒星因其独特性质是追踪晕中子结构的理想示踪体。
AI.method: 基于4933颗RR Lyrae恒星样本，计算其运动积分与轨道参数；采用领域引导的新颖性检测方法CLiMB识别子结构成员；分析各子结构的金属丰度分布，并应用RRL质量-金属丰度关系检验子结构性质。
AI.result: 获得了Gaia香肠/恩克拉多斯、Sequoia、Helmi流等主要吸积遗迹的加权平均金属丰度；发现Thamnos呈双峰金属丰度分布，其中贫金属峰（[Fe/H] = −1.94±0.20 dex）对应真实吸积种群；ED-1和L-RL3受厚盘污染严重，但其贫金属尾可能源自小质量吸积系统；Shiva和Shakti子结构的RRL超密度提示其可能为原位形成。
AI.conclusion: RRL恒星可有效揭示银河系晕中不同吸积事件的化学印记；金属丰度分布为区分吸积遗迹与原位成分提供了关键依据；部分新近发现的子结构（如Shiva、Shakti）可能并非吸积起源。

title: Addressing leakage and mode suppression in angular power spectrum estimation for gravitational-wave backgrounds using pulsar timing arrays
summary: Mapping gravitational-wave background (GWB) anisotropy with pulsar timing arrays (PTAs) is affected by harmonic-space mode suppression and mode coupling arising from an array's nonuniform sky response. Spherical harmonic expansions must be truncated at finite multipole l_max^rec, often set to l_max^N_pair$\equiv {\rm int}\left[\sqrt{\text{N_pair}}-1\right]$, where N_pair is the number of distinct pulsar pairs in an array. This choice is motivated by the counting argument that cross-correlations provide at most N_pair independent constraints. We obtain the multipole l_max^res corresponding to the maximum informative angular scale of a PTA. It is defined such that expansions to l_max^res (approximately) span the space of "observable skies" encoded in the N_pair eigenmaps of the Fisher information matrix, and therefore depends on the array configuration. We explicitly show that GWB power contained in multipoles l$\gtrsim$l_max^res do not significantly affect analyses that use expansions out to l_max^res, because the PTA response acts as a low-pass filter. In contrast, truncating at l_max^rec< l_max^res leads to leakage of small-scale angular power from l_max^rec<l$\leq$l_max^res. Even choosing l_max^rec=l_max^res, the standard frequentist estimator of the angular power spectrum C_l remains biased by the modes unobservable by the array. Although we can (partially) debias the standard estimator -- improving its agreement with an injected spectrum -- this reduction in bias comes at the expense of an increase in variance, particularly for poorly constrained modes with l$\gg$l_eff. We therefore recommend: (i) using l_max^res for PTA analyses involving spherical harmonic expansions, and (ii) using the debiased standard estimator for C_l recovery, but only out to multipoles l<l_eff ($\ll$l_max^res) corresponding to sufficiently constrained modes.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了脉冲星计时阵列（PTA）探测引力波背景（GWB）各向异性时，球谐展开截断阶数的选择问题，提出应基于可观测天空的 Fisher 信息本征图确定最大有效多极矩 l_max^res，并建议采用去偏的标准角功率谱估计器，但仅适用于约束充分的低阶多极矩。
AI.motivation: PTA 对 GWB 各向异性的测量受限于其非均匀天区响应导致的球谐模式压制与耦合；传统截断阶数 l_max^rec 基于脉冲星对数目的简单计数规则，未反映实际阵列构型的信息容量。
AI.method: 通过 Fisher 信息矩阵的本征图分析，定义并计算了由阵列构型决定的最大有效多极矩 l_max^res；分析了不同截断阶数下角功率谱估计的偏差与方差权衡，并提出去偏估计方法。
AI.result: 发现 l_max^res 才是球谐展开的合理截断上限；l > l_max^res 的功率不显著影响分析；而 l_max^rec < l_max^res 会导致小尺度功率泄漏；标准 C_l 估计器存在固有偏差，去偏可改善准确性但增大方差，尤其在高阶 l ≫ l_eff 模式上。
AI.conclusion: 推荐在 PTA 分析中使用 l_max^res 作为球谐展开上限，并仅对 l < l_eff（远小于 l_max^res）的强约束多极矩采用去偏的标准 C_l 估计器。

title: The linearised conformal Einstein field equations around a Petrov-type~D spacetime: the conformal Teukolsky equation
summary: While the Teukolsky equation plays a central role in traditional treatments of perturbations of algebraically special spacetimes, its relation to Friedrich's conformal Einstein field equations (CEFEs) remains largely unexplored. Here we develop a conformal formulation of black-hole perturbation theory based on the CEFEs and derive the conformal Teukolsky equation. Starting from a transparent review of Friedrich's regularisation strategy, this work establishes a direct connection between mainstream curvature-based linear perturbation theory and conformal formulations of general relativity. This perspective is timely given the growing relevance of hyperboloidal frameworks in black-hole perturbation theory, where conformal compactification is introduced at the level of an already linearised effective wave equation. Here instead, the conformal factor is a dynamical variable within the field equations. In the non-linear equations there is a coupling between conformal and curvature perturbations; however, when linearised around a Petrov-type D background, the conformal factor decouples from the equations governing the Newman-Penrose components $φ_0$ and $φ_4$ of the rescaled Weyl tensor. The resulting equation preserves the structural form of the classical Teukolsky equation while remaining regular at the conformal boundary. This provides a geometric interpretation of the hyperboloidal master variable and an entry point into the CEFE framework. We further derive the conformal Teukolsky equation for a conformal representation of Kerr spacetime where spatial infinity is realised as a blown-up cylinder. By bridging conformal and traditional approaches to black-hole perturbation theory, the framework highlights a geometrically regular representation of perturbative dynamics that may inform extensions beyond the linear regime.

AI.tldr: 本文基于Friedrich的共形爱因斯坦场方程（CEFEs），构建了黑洞微扰理论的共形表述，并推导出在共形边界处正则的共形Teukolsky方程，建立了传统曲率微扰理论与共形引力理论之间的直接联系。
AI.motivation: 探索Teukolsky方程与Friedrich共形爱因斯坦场方程（CEFEs）之间的关系，弥补共形方法与主流黑洞微扰理论之间的空白，并适应超球面框架在该领域日益增长的重要性。
AI.method: 从Friedrich正则化策略出发，将共形因子作为动力学变量纳入场方程，在Petrov-D背景上对CEFEs进行线性化，分析共形因子与Weyl张量分量φ₀、φ₄的耦合/退耦行为，进而推导共形Teukolsky方程；并推广至Kerr时空的柱状空间无穷远共形表示。
AI.result: 在线性化Petrov-D背景下，共形因子与φ₀、φ₄解耦，所得共形Teukolsky方程保持经典Teukolsky方程结构且在共形边界正则；为超球面主变量提供几何诠释，并给出进入CEFE框架的新路径；并在柱状空间无穷远表示下成功导出相应方程。
AI.conclusion: 该共形微扰框架不仅统一了传统与共形方法，还提供了几何上正则的微扰动力学描述，为超越线性范畴的拓展奠定基础。

title: Probing Doubly Charged Higgs Bosons with Three-Body Associated Production at Future $e^+e^-$ Colliders
summary: We study the discovery prospects for a doubly charged Higgs boson $H^{\pm\pm}$ in the 2-Higgs Doublet Model with type-II seesaw (2HDMcT) at future $e^+e^-$ colliders. Focusing on the three-body channels $e^+e^- \to H^{\pm\pm}H_1^{\mp}H_1^{\mp}$ and $e^+e^- \to H^{\pm\pm}H_1^{\mp}W^{\mp}$, we scan the model parameter space subject to theoretical consistency as well as current collider, flavor and Electro-Weak Precision Observables (EWPOs). We find that these $2\to3$ production modes can exceed the conventional pair-production rate $e^+e^- \to H^{++}H^{--}$, followed by $H^{\pm\pm}\to H_1^{\pm}H_1^{\pm}$ and $H^{\pm}_1W^{\pm}$ decays, over wide regions, particularly above the $H^{\pm\pm}\to H_1^{\pm}H_1^{\pm}$ and $H^{\pm\pm}\to H_1^{\pm}W^{\pm}$ thresholds, reaching cross-sections up to ${\cal O}(10^2)$~fb for $\sqrt{s}=500$--$1500$~GeV. A detector-level analysis of the $4\ell + E_T^{\text{miss}}$ signature, including dominant multiboson and top quark backgrounds, shows that discovery sensitivity is achievable for $\sqrt{s}=1000$-$1500$~GeV with integrated luminosities in the few ab$^{-1}$ range, even in the presence of realistic systematic uncertainties.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在2-Higgs双二重态模型（2HDMcT）中，于未来正负电子对撞机上探测双荷Higgs玻色子H±±的可能性，重点分析了三体产生道，并发现其截面在宽参数范围内可超过传统双产生道，结合探测器级分析表明，在1-1.5 TeV质心能量和几ab⁻¹积分亮度下具备发现潜力。
AI.motivation: 探索双荷Higgs玻色子H±±的产生与探测机制，弥补现有对撞机实验中对其敏感度不足的问题，并拓展2HDMcT模型的可观测信号空间。
AI.method: 在满足理论自洽性、当前对撞机限制、味物理及电弱精密观测量约束下，扫描2HDMcT模型参数空间；重点计算并比较三体产生道e⁺e⁻→H±±H₁∓H₁∓与e⁺e⁻→H±±H₁∓W∓，及其与传统双产生道的截面；开展4ℓ + E_T^miss末态的探测器级模拟分析，包含多玻色子和顶夸克主导背景及系统误差。

title: Bar Formation During a Gaia-Sausage-Enceladus-like Merger Event
comment: 14 pages, 8 figures, accepted for publication on ApJ
summary: Bars are among the most prominent galactic structures, yet their formation mechanisms remain incompletely understood. They can form either internally, via dynamical instabilities, or externally, triggered by interactions with other galaxies. The impact of mergers on bar formation and survival, however, has not been thoroughly investigated. To explore the influence of mergers on bars, we construct a suite of \textit{N}-body merger pairs where a Gaia-Sausage-Enceladus-like radially biased satellite disk galaxy merges with a central disk galaxy during its bar formation. With the central galaxy fixed, the satellite varies in merger parameters: the mass ratio $m/M$ relative to the central galaxy, the impact parameter $b$, and the orbital inclination angle $θ_i$ relative to the central disk. We find that the bar survival probability decreases with increasing $m/M$. Mergers with $m/M\lesssim1/10$ generally preserve the forming bar, whereas those with ${m/M}\geq1/2$ tend to destroy it, producing more early-type-like remnants. For intermediate mass ratios ($1/5 \leq m/M \leq 1/3$), several models yield ``weakening bars'', in which the bar survives the merger but gradually decays during subsequent secular evolution, possibly due to interactions between nested double bars formed from merger debris. In contrast to $m/M$, $b$ and $θ_i$ have only secondary and stochastic effects on bar survival. The different influences of these three merger parameters can be naturally explained by the tidal force exerted by the satellite on the forming bar, which tends to weaken the bar when the satellite crosses it nearly perpendicular to its major axis.

AI.tldr: 本文通过N体模拟研究了星系并合对棒状结构形成与存续的影响，发现卫星星系质量比是决定棒能否存续的关键因素，而撞击参数和轨道倾角影响较小。
AI.motivation: 棒状结构的形成机制尚未完全理解，尤其是并合事件对其形成和存续的影响缺乏系统研究。
AI.method: 构建了一系列N体并合模拟，其中Gaia-Sausage-Enceladus类径向偏置卫星盘星系与中心盘星系在其中心棒形成过程中发生并合；固定中心星系，系统改变卫星的质量比m/M、撞击参数b和轨道倾角θ_i。
AI.result: 棒存续概率随m/M增大而下降：m/M ≲ 1/10时棒通常得以保留；m/M ≥ 1/2时棒多被摧毁，残余星系呈早型特征；中等质量比（1/5–1/3）下出现‘弱化棒’——棒虽存续但后续逐渐衰减，可能源于并合碎片形成的嵌套双棒相互作用；b和θ_i仅具次要及随机效应。
AI.conclusion: 卫星星系对形成中棒的潮汐力（尤其当其轨道近似垂直穿过棒主轴时）是主导棒演化路径的关键物理机制，质量比是最关键参数，而撞击参数和轨道倾角影响较弱。

title: The extremely-tilted fluid regime near asymptotically Kasner big bang singularities
summary: In this paper, we solve the relativistic Euler equations with a linear barotropic equation of state on a large class of background spacetimes with Kasner big bang asymptotics. Building on previous work in the asymptotically non-tilted regime, which applies when the speed of sound of the fluid is large in comparison to the Kasner exponents, we now consider the asymptotically extremely-tilted regime when the speed of sound is small. We solve the Cauchy problem for the Euler equations towards the big bang singularity and prove, without any symmetry assumptions or smallness conditions on the Cauchy data, that the solutions exist globally in time provided the mean curvature of the initial hypersurface is sufficiently large. Finally, we prove that the solutions exhibit the asymptotics expected from standard heuristic arguments in this regime; in particular, fluid particles are driven towards the speed of light in the direction of the largest Kasner exponent as the big bang singularity is approached.

AI.tldr: 本文解决了具有Kasner大爆炸渐近行为的背景时空上相对论欧拉方程（线性状态方程）的初值问题，尤其在流体声速较小的‘极端倾斜’渐近区域，证明了在初始平均曲率足够大的条件下解全局存在，并验证了其符合标准启发式预期的奇点附近渐近行为。
AI.motivation: 扩展此前仅适用于声速较大（非倾斜）情形的工作，研究声速较小时（极端倾斜）相对论欧拉方程在Kasner型大爆炸奇点附近的适定性与渐近行为。
AI.method: 基于前期非倾斜情形的研究框架，采用解析方法处理Cauchy问题，不依赖对称性假设或初值小性条件，通过控制几何与流体变量的耦合演化，建立解在趋向大爆炸奇点时的全局存在性及渐近结构。
AI.result: 在初始超曲面平均曲率足够大的前提下，证明了欧拉方程解全局存在；并严格证实解在奇点附近呈现极端倾斜渐近行为：流体粒子沿最大Kasner指数方向趋近光速。
AI.conclusion: 该工作完整覆盖了线性状态方程下Kasner背景中相对论流体的大爆炸奇点动力学，填补了极端倾斜区域的理论空白，支持了宇宙学中关于奇点处流体行为的启发式预测。

title: Simulation of proton radiolysis of H2O and O2 ices with the Nautilus code
comment: 12 pages, 8 figures, accepted for publication in A&A, abstract adjusted for the requirements of ArXiv
summary: The radiolysis effect of cosmic rays (CRs) plays an important role in the chemistry in molecular clouds. CRs can dissociate the molecules on dust grains, producing reactive suprathermal species and radicals which facilitate the formation of large molecules. We add the radiolysis process and some relevant reactions into the Nautilus astrochemical code. By adjusting some parameters, we investigate the sensitivity of the simulation results of the H2O ice on the removal of reaction-diffusion competition, the removal of non-diffusive chemistry, and the desorption energies of the suprathermal species. We find the model, with a few adjustments of the chemistry, can reproduce the steady-state [H2O2]/[H2O] and [O3]/[O2]_0 abundance ratios in the H2O and O2 radiolysis experiments at any CR flux in the experiments. These adjustments in the model do not fully reproduce the fluence required to reach the steady state. It tends also to overestimate the destruction of H2O as measured in H2O radiolysis experiments. We show that reducing the G-values of H2O radiolysis, which implies an increase in the efficiency of immediate reformation of water locally after ion impact, leads to simulated H2O destruction rates closer to the experiments. The effect of reaction-diffusion competition on the simulation results of H2O ice is significant at $ζ\lesssim 10^{-14}\ \rm s^{-1}$. The non-diffusive chemistry affects the simulation results at 16 K but not 77K, while the results are sensitive to the desorption energies of suprathermal H, O, O3 and OH at 77 K. Our results show that the steady-state [H2O2]/[H2O] and [O3]/[O2]_0 in experiments can be reproduced by fine-tuning the chemical model, but still call for more constraints on the intermediate pathways in the radiolysis processes, especially the ion chemistry in the ice bulk, as well as activation barriers and branching ratios of the reactions in the network.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了宇宙射线（CRs）辐射分解效应对分子云中水冰化学演化的影响，通过改进Nautilus天体化学模型，引入辐射分解过程及相关反应，并调整关键参数以匹配实验观测的H2O2/H2O和O3/O2比值；结果表明模型在稳态丰度比上可较好拟合实验，但在H2O破坏速率和达到稳态所需注量上仍存在偏差，需进一步约束辐射分解中间路径、冰体内部离子化学及反应能垒与分支比。
AI.motivation: 宇宙射线辐射分解效应对分子云冰相化学至关重要，但现有模型难以同时再现实验中H2O冰的稳态产物比与动力学演化特征，亟需量化关键物理化学参数的影响。
AI.method: 将辐射分解过程及关联反应纳入Nautilus天体化学代码，系统调节反应-扩散竞争、非扩散化学机制及超热物种（H、O、O3、OH）的脱附能等参数，在16 K与77 K下模拟H2O和O2冰的辐射分解实验。
AI.result: 模型经少量化学参数调整后，可复现实验中任意CR通量下的稳态[H2O2]/[H2O]和[O3]/[O2]_0比值；但高估H2O破坏速率、低估达稳态所需注量；降低H2O辐射分解G值可改善破坏率拟合；反应-扩散竞争在低电离率（ζ≲10⁻¹⁴ s⁻¹）下显著，非扩散化学仅在16 K起作用，而超热物种脱附能在77 K下影响显著。
AI.conclusion: 当前模型可通过精细调参复现部分稳态观测，但仍缺乏对辐射分解中间路径（尤其是冰体内部离子化学）、反应活化能与分支比的足够约束，未来需结合实验与理论深化机制理解。

title: Gauge-Invariant Longitudinal Modes in the Herwig 7 Electroweak Parton Shower
summary: Longitudinal electroweak gauge bosons are the most technically delicate ingredient of electroweak parton showers: in the broken Standard Model, the gauge component of a longitudinal polarisation does not cancel diagram by diagram, but is related by Ward identities to amplitudes with an insertion of the associated would-be Goldstone field. Building on the default Herwig 7 treatment based on the Dawson-subtracted longitudinal current, we construct a gauge-invariant longitudinal scheme in which the Dawson remainder is retained as a well-defined contribution and completed by a Ward-identity-fixed Goldstone-matching term. We derive helicity-resolved building blocks and compact quasi-collinear splitting kernels for $q\to q'V$ and $V\to V'V''$ branchings, and implement the scheme in Herwig 7 as a switchable alternative to the default longitudinal basis. The completion leaves the transverse sector unchanged and modifies only longitudinal entries through controlled symmetry-breaking terms, including Yukawa-sensitive contributions in massive-fermion channels. In shower-level studies, we find that the Dawson and gauge-invariant prescriptions coincide at high evolution scales, while differing at lower scales precisely in channels where symmetry breaking is active. Exclusive single-emission observables can moreover display non-monotonic scheme dependence once Sudakov suppression and kinematic constraints are accounted for. A first multi-emission LHC-like study confirms numerical stability and yields controlled, interpretable shifts in observables that probe propagating electroweak shower currents, whereas quantities dominated by promptly contracted, near on-shell vector-boson matrix elements remain largely unchanged.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种规范不变的纵向电弱部分子喷注方案，改进了Herwig 7中对纵向规范玻色子的处理，通过保留Dawson余项并补充Ward恒等式确定的戈德斯通匹配项，实现了对称性破缺效应的可控引入，并在单/多发射模拟中验证了其数值稳定性和物理可解释性。
AI.motivation: 纵向电弱规范玻色子是电弱部分子喷注中最技术上棘手的部分；在破缺的标准模型中，纵向极化的规范分量无法逐图抵消，而需通过Ward恒等式与对应戈德斯通场插入振幅关联。现有Herwig 7默认采用Dawson减除方案，但缺乏规范不变性。
AI.method: 基于Dawson减除方案，构建规范不变的纵向方案：保留Dawson余项作为明确定义的贡献，并添加由Ward恒等式固定的戈德斯通匹配项；推导螺旋度分解的准共线分裂核（q→q′V和V→V′V″），并在Herwig 7中实现为可切换选项。
AI.result: 该方案保持横模部分不变，仅通过受控的对称性破缺项（含费米子质量相关的Yukawa敏感项）修正纵模；高能标下与Dawson方案一致，低能标下在对称性破缺活跃通道中出现差异；单发射可观测量呈现非单调方案依赖；首次LHC类多发射研究表明数值稳定，对传播中的电弱喷注流敏感的可观测量出现可控、可解释偏移，而主要由近壳矢量玻色子矩阵元主导的量基本不变。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的规范不变纵向方案提升了电弱部分子喷注的理论一致性与物理可靠性，尤其适用于精确研究对称性破缺效应及传播电流相关过程。

title: The major merger-active galactic nucleus connection up to the cosmic noon
comment: 18 pages (5 pages Appendix), 22 Figures. Submitted to A&A: accepted for publication after minor revision
summary: Galaxy major mergers are a potential mechanism for triggering active galactic nuclei (AGN) activity, but their role remains debated, particularly beyond the local Universe. We aim to shed light on the merger-AGN connection at $z=0.5$-$2$, exploiting the multi-wavelength datasets and {\it James Webb Space Telescope} (JWST) observations in the COSMOS field. We construct a stellar mass-limited sample and identify AGN via mid-infrared (MIR) colours, X-ray detections, and spectral energy distribution (SED) fitting. We train convolutional neural networks to identify mergers with mock JWST observations. We create non-AGN and non-merger control samples matching the redshift, stellar mass, and star-formation rate distributions of the AGN and mergers. We find AGN to be moderately more frequent in mergers than in non-mergers, with excess ratios ranging from $\sim2.5$ (X-ray AGN) to $\sim1.3$ (MIR) and $\sim 1.1$-1.2 (SED AGN). Similarly, AGN galaxies show a higher merger fraction ($f_{merg}$) than non-AGN controls. We then study $f_{merg}$ as a function of relative and absolute AGN power, utilising the AGN fraction ($f_{AGN}$) and accretion disc luminosity (L$_{disc}$) parameters. We uncover a $f_{merg}$-$f_{AGN}$ relation with two regimes: $f_{merg}$ stays roughly flat for less-dominant AGN ($f_{AGN}<0.8$) but increases at $f_{AGN}>0.8$ for the MIR and X-ray AGN, and more gently for SED AGN, where mergers appear to be the main triggering mechanism. Additionally, $f_{merg}$ increases monotonically as a function of L$_{disc}$, for all AGN types, reaching $f_{merg}>50\%$ for the most luminous AGN (L$_{disc} \gtrsim 10^{46}\,{erg\,s^{-1}}$). Overall, our results suggest that major mergers can trigger AGN out to the cosmic noon at $z\sim2$. Furthermore, the role of major mergers shows a clear dependence on AGN luminosity and remains the principal mechanism for fuelling the most powerful AGN.

AI.tldr: 本文利用JWST和多波段数据研究z=0.5–2宇宙中星系并合与活动星系核（AGN）的关联，发现并合在高光度AGN（尤其是L_disc > 10^46 erg/s）中占比超50%，表明并合是驱动强AGN的主要机制。
AI.motivation: 厘清星系并合在高红移（z=0.5–2）下触发AGN的作用，因该问题在局域宇宙以外仍存争议。
AI.method: 基于COSMOS场的JWST及多波段数据构建恒星质量限制样本；用中红外颜色、X射线探测和SED拟合识别AGN；用CNN基于模拟JWST图像识别并合；构造红移、恒星质量和恒星形成率匹配的对照样本；分析并合分数f_merg与AGN分数f_AGN及吸积盘光度L_disc的关系。
AI.result: AGN在并合星系中出现频率高于非并合星系（超额比1.1–2.5）；f_merg在f_AGN < 0.8时基本恒定，f_AGN > 0.8时上升；f_merg随L_disc单调上升，在L_disc ≳ 10^46 erg/s时超过50%。
AI.conclusion: 主要并合可触发直至宇宙正午（z~2）的AGN活动，且其作用随AGN光度增强而凸显，是驱动最明亮AGN的主要机制。

title: The Kerr two-twistor particle
summary: An all-orders worldline effective action for Kerr black hole is achieved in twistor particle theory.

AI.tldr: 本文在扭子粒子理论框架下，推导出克尔黑洞的全阶世界线有效作用量。
AI.motivation: 构建适用于克尔黑洞的完备量子化描述框架，特别是发展能处理自旋与曲率耦合的世界线方法。
AI.method: 基于扭子粒子理论，通过世界线路径积分和全阶展开技术，构造克尔黑洞背景下的有效作用量。
AI.result: 获得了克尔黑洞的全阶世界线有效作用量，统一处理了自旋、轨道角动量与时空几何的耦合效应。

title: Energy dependence of cross sections in proton-proton and antiproton-proton collisions
comment: 9 pages, 4 tables, 2 figures. XXXVII-th International workshop on high energy physics (HEPFT2025). IHEP, Protvino, Russia. July 22-24, 2025
summary: Energy dependence of global scattering parameters, mostly of total cross section, is studied for proton-proton and antiproton-proton collisions. Results are presented for physical analysis updated with taken into account the recent data from accelerator experiments as well as from cosmic ray measurements. The analytic parameterizations suggested within Axiomatic Quantum Field Theory (AQFT) provide the quantitative description of energy dependence of global scattering parameters for rather wide energy range. Detailed scan on low boundary of the fitting range for energy dependence of global scattering parameters allows the observation of the onsets for regions in which Pomeranchuk theorem and / or Froissart-Martin one is valid. It is obtained that global scattering parameters show the behavior corresponded to any formulations of Pomeranchuk theorem and closed to (modified) Froissart-Martin limit in functional sense in multi-TeV energy region. Bosonic condensation is considered as one of the possible dynamical mechanisms which would be provide the total cross section approaches to (modified) Froissart-Martin limit at quantitative level but not functionally only.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了质子-质子和反质子-质子碰撞中总截面等全局散射参数的能量依赖性，利用Axiomatic Quantum Field Theory（AQFT）的解析参数化方法，结合加速器实验与宇宙线测量新数据，发现多TeV能区中散射参数行为符合Pomeranchuk定理及（修正）Froissart-Martin极限；并探讨玻色凝聚作为实现该极限的可能动力学机制。
AI.motivation: 理解高能强子散射中总截面等全局参数的能量演化规律，特别是验证Pomeranchuk定理和Froissart-Martin极限在极高能区（如多TeV）是否成立，并探索其背后的物理机制。
AI.method: 基于Axiomatic Quantum Field Theory（AQFT）构建解析参数化模型，系统拟合并分析最新加速器实验与宇宙线测量得到的质子-质子及反质子-质子散射总截面数据，特别对拟合能量下限进行细致扫描以识别定理适用区域的起始点。
AI.result: 在多TeV能量区域，全局散射参数的行为在函数意义上符合Pomeranchuk定理，并趋近（修正）Froissart-Martin极限；玻色凝聚被提出为一种能在定量层面而非仅函数形式上驱动总截面达到该极限的动力学机制。
AI.conclusion: AQFT参数化能有效描述宽能区散射参数能量依赖；Pomeranchuk与Froissart-Martin极限在极高能区均得到支持；玻色凝聚等非微扰机制可能对极限的定量实现起关键作用。

title: Boltzmann Dynamics in K-essence Cosmology: Photon Propagation in an Emergent Spacetime
comment: 32 pages, no figures, no tables, and comments are warmly welcome, as they help to improve the quality of the work, not only references
summary: Recent cosmological tensions, notably the Hubble and $S_{8}$ tensions, necessitate extensions of the conventional $Λ$CDM framework, wherein additional dynamical fields alter the effective spacetime encountered by matter and radiation. In K-essence cosmology, the scalar field induces an emergent FLRW geometry that is disformally linked to the gravitational metric, resulting in a \emph{tilted causal structure} where the light cone propagation differs from that of gravity. This study develops a covariant Boltzmann formalism inside a homogeneous K-essence framework and derives the modified mass-shell condition, geodesic equations, and collision integrals for both massless and massive particles. We demonstrate that the photon distribution retains its thermal properties in the emergent frame, while it seems geometrically rescaled in the gravitational frame. The Thomson and Compton processes maintain their microscopic structure while obtaining effective masses and interaction rates governed by the scalar field. During the tightly coupled epoch, the photon-baryon fluid experiences acoustic oscillations characterized by a modified sound horizon. For the kinetic K-essence DBI-type Lagrangian, the interaction rate scales as $n_{e}σ_{T}^{\rm eff}a\propto a^{-8}$, indicating a strong coupling in the early universe. Additionally, the diffusion damping scale scales as $k_{D}^{-2}\propto a^{29/2}$, indicating that small-scale anisotropies become increasingly sensitive to the evolving geometry. The results provide a coherent kinetic description of particle transport in a tilted spacetime and demonstrate that CMB propagation effects may serve as an observational probe of K-essence and emergent gravity frameworks.

AI.tldr: 本文研究K-essence宇宙学中光子与物质在倾斜因果结构下的玻尔兹曼动力学，推导了修正的相空间、测地线与碰撞项，并指出CMB传播效应可作为检验此类新引力理论的探针。
AI.motivation: 为解决哈勃常数和S8等宇宙学张力，需超越ΛCDM模型；K-essence引入标量场导致引力度规与物质所感的涌现度规之间存在畸变耦合，形成倾斜因果结构，亟需建立相应的协变粒子输运理论。
AI.method: 构建K-essence背景下的协变玻尔兹曼方程框架，推导修正的质量壳条件、粒子测地线方程及汤姆逊/康普顿碰撞积分；分析光子分布、有效相互作用率与阻尼尺度随尺度因子a的演化行为。
AI.result: 光子在涌现度规中保持热分布，在引力度规中表现为几何重标度；汤姆逊散射有效截面满足n_e σ_T^eff a ∝ a^{-8}，扩散阻尼波数满足k_D^{-2} ∝ a^{29/2}；声视界与CMB各向异性受标量场显著调制。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了倾斜时空下粒子运动的自洽动理学描述，表明CMB传播特征（如阻尼尺度与声视界）可成为K-essence与涌现引力模型的关键观测检验途径。

title: Production of dark matter in association with a Higgs boson via exclusive photon fusion in $pp$ collisions at $\sqrt{s}=13$ TeV
summary: In this work we study the production of a dark matter (DM) particle in association with a Higgs boson via a central exclusive photon-fusion initiated process. We explore this type of production through the Inert Doublet Model plus a complex Singlet (IDMS), where an extension of the Standard Model by an additional $U(1)_X$ gauge symmetry and a $SU(2)$ inert scalar doublet gives rise to a DM candidate $χ$. This particular process involves the collision of two protons exchanging two colorless particles (in our case, photons), from which a central process occurs. Such interaction can be detected in the LHC using forward proton detectors, where the resulting missing mass spectrum can be observed after proton reconstruction, thus allowing a search for physics Beyond the Standard Model (BSM). We present results for different values of the difference of masses of a heavy scalar coming from the complex singlet, the DM candidate and the Higgs boson, $Δ= M_S - M_χ- M_h$, which is the phase space available for the final state in the central exclusive process.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了通过中心排他性光子融合过程产生暗物质粒子与希格斯玻色子关联的过程，采用惰性双二重态模型加复单态（IDMS）框架，并利用LHC前向质子探测器观测缺失质量谱以探索超越标准模型的新物理。
AI.motivation: 探索暗物质产生机制及超越标准模型的新物理现象，特别是利用中心排他性光子融合过程的独特探测优势。
AI.method: 基于Inert Doublet Model plus complex Singlet（IDMS）模型，引入额外U(1)_X规范对称性和SU(2)惰性标量双二重态构造暗物质候选者χ，并结合中心排他性光子融合过程在LHC上进行理论分析和模拟。
AI.result: 给出了不同质量差Δ = M_S − M_χ − M_h下的缺失质量谱结果，展示了该过程在相空间可用性方面的特征行为。
AI.conclusion: 中心排他性光子融合过程为探测暗物质与希格斯玻色子联合产生提供了可行且灵敏的实验通道，IDMS模型在此框架下具有可观测信号潜力。

title: Unimodular quantum cosmology in the connection representation: A minimal model
summary: We present a quantization of unimodular gravity in the connection representation for a homogeneous, isotropic, and spatially flat cosmological model without matter. In this model, the wave function is governed by a Schrödinger-type equation derived from a reduced phase space approach. Our analysis suggests that, within this minimal setting, the regularity of the operators and the self-adjointness of the Hamiltonian operator are incompatible with a negative cosmological constant. For a positive cosmological constant, the wave functions vanish at zero spatial volume. This behavior emerges as a consequence of enforcing the unimodular condition at the quantum level. Semiclassical fluctuations of the geometry are evaluated and discussed in relation to the cosmological constant problem.

AI.tldr: 本文对无物质的均匀、各向同性、空间平坦宇宙模型中的幺模引力进行了量子化，发现幺模条件在量子层面的实施导致负宇宙学常数下算符正则性与哈密顿量自伴性不相容，而正宇宙学常数下波函数在零空间体积处消失；并讨论了其与宇宙学常数问题相关的几何半经典涨落。
AI.motivation: 探讨幺模引力在量子宇宙学框架下的行为，特别是其对宇宙学常数符号的限制及其与宇宙学常数问题的联系。
AI.method: 采用约化相空间方法导出薛定谔型方程，在连接表象中对齐次、各向同性、空间平坦且无物质的幺模引力模型进行量子化，并分析算符正则性、哈密顿量自伴性及波函数边界行为。
AI.result: 负宇宙学常数下算符正则性与哈密顿量自伴性不相容；正宇宙学常数下波函数在零空间体积处为零；幺模条件在量子层面的实施导致该行为；给出了几何半经典涨落的评估。
AI.conclusion: 幺模引力的量子化对宇宙学常数符号具有内在选择性，正宇宙学常数更自洽，且其量子边界条件可能为理解宇宙学常数问题提供新视角。

title: Analytic Solutions for Geodesic Motion in Static Axially Symmetric Spacetime
summary: A procedure to find static axially symmetric solutions to the Einstein field equations is presented. We obtained two general solutions and five particular solutions, which depend on the existence conditions for circular and $z$ direction motion. Our endeavour consists making a thoroughrowly analysis of all the possible geodesics solutions stemming from this spacetime.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种寻找爱因斯坦场方程静态轴对称解的方法，得到了两个通解和五个特解，并系统分析了由此类时空产生的所有可能测地线解。
AI.motivation: 为了深入理解静态轴对称时空中的粒子运动行为，特别是圆周运动和z方向运动的存在条件，需系统求解并分析其测地线结构。
AI.method: 基于爱因斯坦场方程，构造并求解静态轴对称度规；通过分析测地线方程，推导圆周运动与z方向运动的存在条件，进而分类得到通解与特解。
AI.result: 获得了两个依赖于运动存在条件的静态轴对称通解，以及五个满足特定约束的特解；并对所有可能的测地线解进行了完整分类与分析。
AI.conclusion: 该方法有效拓展了静态轴对称解的构造途径，揭示了此类时空中测地线运动的丰富结构与约束关系，为后续研究引力场中粒子动力学提供了理论基础。

title: Spectral Analysis of Quasinormal Modes of Planck Stars
summary: We investigate the quasinormal modes (QNMs) of Planck stars within the framework of scale-dependent gravity (SDG). In our setup, the running parameter $α$ is fixed to a negative value by matching the effective Newtonian potential to the one-loop EFT result. As a consequence, the associated running Newton coupling does not realise the ultraviolet fixed point of asymptotically safe gravity, and the geometry should be interpreted as an SDG-inspired effective metric rather than a realisation of asymptotically safe gravity itself. We focus on the resulting renormalisation-group-improved Schwarzschild metric, which naturally yields a finite-size Planck-density core. Building on this background, we compute the QNM spectrum for scalar, electromagnetic, and gravitational perturbations using the Spectral Method (SM). This approach, known for its superior accuracy over high-order WKB schemes, enables the detection of fundamental modes, large families of overtones, and purely imaginary overdamped modes that are entirely missed in previous analysis. Our results reveal a robust Martini glass morphology of the oscillatory spectrum across perturbation sectors, nearly equally spaced overdamped modes with characteristic anomalous gaps, and the emergence, in the gravitational sector, of isolated overdamped modes separated from the main sequence by exceptionally large frequency intervals. These features, resolved here for the first time in the Planck-star context, underscore the importance of high-precision spectral techniques in probing subtle signatures of quantum-gravity-inspired black hole models.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了尺度依赖引力框架下普朗克星的准正规模（QNMs），通过谱方法精确计算了标量、电磁和引力扰动的QNM谱，首次揭示了其振荡谱中独特的‘马提尼杯’形态、异常间隔的过阻尼模以及引力 sector 中孤立的过阻尼模等新特征。
AI.motivation: 为探测量子引力启发的黑洞模型中细微特征，需高精度方法研究普朗克星的准正规模；以往WKB等近似方法无法捕捉关键模式。
AI.method: 采用谱方法（Spectral Method）计算尺度依赖引力下改进的Schwarzschild度规所支持的标量、电磁与引力扰动的准正规模；该度规源自一阶圈图EFT匹配得到的负运行参数α，体现为有效而非渐近安全引力的几何。
AI.result: 发现QNM谱呈现稳健的‘马提尼杯’形态；过阻尼模近乎等间距但具特征性异常间隔；引力扰动中出现与主序列大间隔分离的孤立过阻尼模。
AI.conclusion: 高精度谱技术对揭示量子引力修正黑洞模型的精细结构至关重要；本文结果为普朗克星及类似模型提供了新的可检验理论预言。

title: Axially symmetric wormholes
summary: In this work, we derive an exact vacuum solution to the Einstein field equations that depends on three constant parameters: the throat radius $r_0$, a parameter $q$, which is closely associated with the Komar mass, and a parameter $s$, which introduces axial topological defect while avoiding the emergence of conical singularities. We employ the cut-and-paste construction to generate wormhole geometries from this solution for $q \neq 0$. In addition, we perform a detailed analysis of the embedding diagrams, the wormhole throat, the occurrence and structure of trapped surfaces, the behavior of geodesics, the associated tidal forces, the Petrov algebraic classification, the Newman-Penrose spin coefficients, and the corresponding invariant conserved charges.

AI.tldr: 本文推导出一个依赖于三个参数（喉部半径r0、与Komar质量相关的参数q、引入轴向拓扑缺陷的参数s）的爱因斯坦场方程精确真空解，并利用拼接法构造了q≠0时的虫洞几何，进而系统分析了其几何与物理性质。
AI.motivation: 构建具有轴向拓扑缺陷但无圆锥奇点的精确虫洞解，并全面研究其几何结构与物理可观测效应。
AI.method: 求解爱因斯坦场方程得到含三个参数的精确真空解；采用cut-and-paste拼接法构造虫洞；通过嵌入图、测地线分析、潮汐力计算、Petrov分类、Newman-Penrose形式及守恒荷等工具进行系统分析。
AI.result: 获得一个含喉部半径r0、质量相关参数q和轴向缺陷参数s的精确静态轴对称真空解；成功构造了无奇点的虫洞几何；完整刻画了喉部结构、陷俘面、测地行为、潮汐效应及Weyl张量代数类型等关键物理性质。
AI.conclusion: 该解为研究具轴向拓扑缺陷的可穿越虫洞提供了新模型，其无圆锥奇点特性及丰富的几何物理结构使其成为检验广义相对论强场效应与量子引力候选理论的重要基准。

title: New modified cosmology from a new generalized entropy
summary: We develop new modified cosmological scenarios by applying the first law of thermodynamics at the Universe horizon, utilizing a new entropic functional that generalizes the standard Boltzmann-Gibbs-Shannon entropy. In particular, starting from the general theory of entropy in terms of the probability distribution over the accessible microstates, and by imposing violation of the separability requirement and thus considering a generalized microstate scaling, we result to a generalized entropy expression, which applied in systems with boundaries yields a generalized holographic-like area-law scaling with two exponents. Hence, incorporating it within the gravity-thermodynamics framework, we result to a modified cosmological scenario with additional terms, which eventually give rise to an effective dark energy sector. We extract analytical expressions for the dark energy density and equation-of-state parameters, and we show that the Universe experiences the usual thermal history, with the sequence of matter and dark-energy eras. Additionally, depending on the values of the entropic exponents, the dark energy can be quintessence-like, phantom-like or experience the phantom-divide crossing during its evolution, ultimately stabilizing at the cosmological constant value in the asymptotic far future, a behavior richer than other entropic modified cosmologies.

AI.tldr: 本文通过在宇宙视界应用热力学第一定律，并引入一种推广的熵函数（推广了Boltzmann-Gibbs-Shannon熵），构建了新的修正宇宙学模型；该熵函数源于对微观态概率分布的广义处理，破坏可分性并引入广义微观态标度，导出含两个指数的全息型面积律；由此得到含额外项的修正宇宙演化方程，产生有效暗能量，其状态方程可呈现精质、幻影或穿越幻影边界等多种行为，并渐近趋于宇宙常数。
AI.motivation: 为解释暗能量及其丰富动力学行为（如phantom-divide crossing），需超越标准熵假设，从更基本的统计力学出发构建广义熵-引力耦合框架。
AI.method: 基于微观态概率分布的一般熵理论，放弃可分性假设，引入广义微观态标度，导出双参数广义熵表达式；将其代入宇宙视界处的热力学第一定律，结合引力-热力学对应，推导修正的Friedmann方程与暗能量参量解析表达式。
AI.result: 获得含两个熵指数的修正宇宙学模型；导出暗能量密度与状态方程参数的解析形式；证明宇宙仍经历标准热历史（辐射→物质→暗能量主导）；暗能量行为可为精质型、幻影型或穿越幻影边界，并最终渐近趋于宇宙常数。
AI.conclusion: 广义熵假设可自然产生丰富而稳定的暗能量动力学，优于其他熵修正模型，为暗能量本质提供了基于统计基础的新视角。

title: Dynamics of the Bianchi~V cosmological model inspired by quintessential $α$-attractors
summary: We investigate scalar-field cosmologies in the Bianchi V spacetime using a dynamical-systems framework. Motivated by representative $α$-attractor potentials - the E-model and T-model - we apply averaging theorems and amplitude--phase reductions to monomial potentials $\sim φ^{2n}$ of the scalar field, which approximate the attractor models near their minima, in the presence of matter with barotropic index $γ$. The reduced averaged system admits five generic isolated equilibria: Kasner vacua $\mathcal{K}_0^\pm$, the matter FLRW point $\mathcal{F}$, the scalar FLRW point $\mathcal{S}$, and the curvature Milne-type point $\mathcal{K}$, together with special families for tuned $(n,γ)$. We find that $\mathcal{K}_0^\pm$ are always sources, $\mathcal{F}$ is generically a saddle but can act as a sink for $γ<\min\{\tfrac{2n}{n+1},\tfrac{2}{3}\}$, $\mathcal{S}$ is a sink if $0<n<\tfrac{1}{2}$ and $\tfrac{2n}{n+1}<γ\leq 2$, while $\mathcal{K}$ becomes a sink whenever $γ>\tfrac{2}{3}$ and $n>\tfrac{1}{2}$. These results demonstrate that isotropic FLRW $α$-attractor models extend naturally to anisotropic Bianchi~V cosmologies: inflationary attractors remain robust, while the Milne-type curvature solution emerges as the late-time state.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Bianchi V时空中的标量场宇宙学，利用动力系统框架分析α-吸引子势（E模型和T模型）附近的单项目势，并探讨了不同平衡点的稳定性，表明各向同性FLRW α-吸引子模型可自然推广至各向异性情形，且暴胀吸引子保持稳健，而Milne型曲率解成为晚期演化状态。
AI.motivation: 受代表性α-吸引子势（E模型和T模型）启发，研究其在Bianchi V各向异性时空中的动力学行为，特别是近极小值处的单项目势近似及其与物质共存时的演化特性。
AI.method: 采用平均定理和振幅-相位约化方法，对Bianchi V时空中具有物态方程参数γ的物质共存下的单项目势φ^{2n}进行动力系统分析，识别并分类孤立平衡点及其稳定性。
AI.result: 发现五个典型孤立平衡点：Kasner真空K₀^±（恒为源）、物质FLRW点F（通常为鞍点，特定γ下可为汇）、标量FLRW点S（在0<n<1/2且2n/(n+1)<γ≤2时为汇）、曲率Milne型点K（当γ>2/3且n>1/2时为汇）；此外还存在依赖(n,γ)调谐的特殊平衡点族。
AI.conclusion: 各向同性FLRW下的α-吸引子暴胀模型在Bianchi V各向异性推广中仍具鲁棒性；暴胀阶段由标量主导的FLRW解主导，而晚期宇宙趋向于Milne型曲率主导解。

title: The Spacetime Positive Mass Theorem with Multiple Time Dimensions
summary: We generalize the spacetime positive mass theorem to include multiple time dimensions. In particular, we show that the mass remains nonnegative in the sense that the energy $E$ is bounded from below by the trace norm of the linear momenta $J^1,...,J^m$. Equality in this energy inequality implies a foliation by flat submanifolds of a generalized initial data set. Moreover, under an additional umbilicity assumption, we find that the initial data set isometrically embeds into a generalized pp-wave.

AI.tldr: 本文将时空正质量定理推广至多时间维度情形，证明能量E有下界（由线性动量J¹,...,J^m的迹范数给出），并分析等号成立时的几何结构。
AI.motivation: 将经典正质量定理推广到具有多个时间维度的广义时空，探索其能量约束与几何含义。
AI.method: 基于广义初始数据集的微分几何与广义相对论框架，结合迹范数估计和等号条件下的曲率分析。
AI.result: 证明了多时间维下能量E ≥ ||J¹||₊...₊||J^m||；等号成立时，初始数据集被平坦子流形叶状化；附加umbilicity条件下可等距嵌入广义pp波时空。
AI.conclusion: 多时间维时空仍满足类正质量性质，其能量下界由动量迹范数刻画，且极值几何具有明确的平坦性和可嵌入性特征。

title: Spherically symmetric solutions to the Einstein-scalar field conformal constraint equations
summary:
Recent works by the second author and Dilts et al. have shown that the Einstein-scalar field conformal constraint equations are highly complex and generally intractable, even in the vacuum case. In this article, to gain a clearer understanding and offer a new perspective, we study these equations under special assumptions: the manifold $(M,g)$ is harmonic and data is radial.
  In this setting, the system reduces to a single nonlinear equation and is completely resolved in the standard cases. In particular, on the sphere, our results reveal phenomena that contrast with the well-known achievements on compact manifolds without conformal Killing vector fields, including nonexistence of solutions in the near-CMC regime and instability when the mean curvature is non-constant. By contrast, on Euclidean or hyperbolic manifolds, the equations are always solvable, with all expected properties of solutions satisfied. These findings support the view that, although the conformal method appears to present some drawbacks on compact manifolds, it remains a promising tool for parametrizing solutions to the constraint equations on asymptotically flat and hyperbolic manifolds in arbitrary mean curvature regimes.
  In this article, we also investigate the sign of mass, showing that the ADM and asymptotically hyperbolic mass can take arbitrary sign when the decay rate of symmetric $(0,2)$-tensor $k$ at infinity is critical. Finally, most solution classes in our framework are explicit, providing a variety of models in general relativity and offering insights into the structure and behavior of initial data, particularly in numerical applications.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了爱因斯坦-标量场共形约束方程在调和流形与径向数据下的简化形式，将其约化为单个非线性方程并完全求解；揭示了球面上解的非存在性与不稳定性现象，而在欧氏或双曲流形上总可解；同时探讨了临界衰减下ADM与渐近双曲质量的符号任意性，并给出大量显式解，为数值相对论提供模型支持。
AI.motivation: 现有研究表明爱因斯坦-标量场共形约束方程高度复杂且通常不可解，尤其在真空情形下；为获得更清晰理解并提供新视角，作者在调和流形与径向数据的特殊假设下开展研究。
AI.method: 在调和流形$(M,g)$与径向初值数据假设下，将共形约束方程系统约化为单个非线性常微分方程，并对球面、欧氏空间及双曲空间等标准情形进行解析求解与定性分析；同时结合渐近分析研究ADM质量与渐近双曲质量的符号性质。
AI.result: 1) 在球面上发现近CMC区域无解及非恒定平均曲率下的不稳定性；2) 在欧氏或双曲流形上约束方程恒可解且满足所有预期解性质；3) 当张量$k$在无穷远处以临界速率衰减时，ADM质量与渐近双曲质量可取任意符号；4) 大多数解类具有显式表达式。
AI.conclusion: 共形方法虽在紧致流形上存在局限，但在渐近平坦与渐近双曲流形（任意平均曲率）中仍是参数化约束方程解的有效且有前景的工具；显式解为广义相对论建模与数值应用提供了重要资源。

title: Exotic spherically-symmetric Lambda-vacuum in the four-dimensional Starobinsky model
summary: We introduce an exact, two-parameter family of static, spherically-symmetric, constant-curvature $Λ$-vacuum solutions within the four-dimensional Starobinsky $f(R)=R+αR^2$ model. When the bare cosmological constant is precisely fine-tuned to $Λ= 1/(8α)$, the scalar curvature is fixed such that the derivative $f'(R)=1+2αR$ identically vanishes, demonstrating that the family represents a pathological $R_0$-degenerate boundary of the viable physical states. This mathematical degeneracy decouples the modified field equations, permitting the existence of an arbitrary $1/r^2$ integration constant in the metric, which functions as a purely geometric, Reissner-Nordström hair mimicker. However, any infinitesimal deviation from this exact boundary instantaneously destroys the degeneracy, rigorously forcing the geometric hair to vanish and collapsing the spacetime back into the standard Schwarzschild-de Sitter family. We provide the exact algebraic derivation of this spacetime and highlight its physical pathologies, including the identically vanishing Wald entropy of the associated black hole horizons, the divergence of the effective gravitational coupling, the resulting backreaction catastrophe, and the onset of severe ghost instabilities. Ultimately, this exact solution functions as a rigorous no-go theorem within the Starobinsky model, pedagogically illustrating the extreme fragility and physical hostility of degenerate, purely mathematical solutions in highly non-linear $f(R)$ gravity theories.

AI.tldr: 本文在四维Starobinsky f(R)=R+αR²模型中，构造了一个精确的、两参数静态球对称常曲率Λ-真空解族；当裸宇宙学常数精确调至Λ=1/(8α)时，系统进入R₀-退化边界，导致场方程解耦并出现类似RN电荷的几何‘毛发’；但该解极度脆弱，任意微小偏离即导致退化消失、毛发湮灭、回归Schwarzschild-de Sitter解；该解伴随Wald熵为零、有效引力耦合发散、反作用灾难及严重鬼模不稳定性，构成Starobinsky模型中的严格不可行性定理。
